original: gcig bkag pas gzhan med par rtogs par bya ba gang yin pa de ni rgyu mi dmigs pa kho nas go bar byed kyi gzhan gyis ni ma yin no //üîΩmi dmigs pa rnam pa bzhi po 'di la yang kha cig tu ni don @48a * //
analyzed: gcig bkag pas gzhan med par rtogs par bya ba gang yin pa de ni rgyu mi dmigs pa kho nas go bar byed kyi gzhan gyis ni ma yin no // mi dmigs pa rnam pa bzhi po 'di la yang kha cig tu ni don @48a * //
translated: That which is to be understood by the negation of one thing through the non-apprehension of another is understood only through the non-apprehension of the cause, and not through anything else.

original: gzhan sgrub pa dang 'gog pas dgag pa byed la kha cig tu ni dngos su'o //üîΩdes na don sgrub pa dang dgag pa la brten pa'i dgag pa la mi dmigs pa nyid du gzhung btsugs pas sgrub pa yin te /
analyzed: gzhan sgrub pa dang 'gog pas dgag pa byed la kha cig tu ni dngos su'o // des na don sgrub pa dang dgag pa la brten pa'i dgag pa la mi dmigs pa nyid du gzhung btsugs pas sgrub pa yin te /
translated: And in this fourfold non-apprehension, in some cases the negation is effected by the affirmation and negation of another object, and in some cases it is effected directly.

original: de'i dbye ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i dbye ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, the establishment of the negation in the case of affirmation and negation of an object is based on non-apprehension, because it is a division of that.

original: da ni dngos su 'gog pa'i dbang du byas nas rang bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: da ni dngos su 'gog pa'i dbang du byas nas rang bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: Now, from the point of view of direct negation, he says, ‚Äúnature,‚Äù etc.

original: ni'i sgra dang nges par gzung ba gnyis dang / med pa ni rang bzhin mi dmigs pa kho na yin te zhes ji ltar bstan pa bzhin ma yin pa dang rjes su 'brel to //
analyzed: ni'i sgra dang nges par gzung ba gnyis dang / med pa ni rang bzhin mi dmigs pa kho na yin te zhes ji ltar bstan pa bzhin ma yin pa dang rjes su 'brel to //
translated: The words ‚Äúonly‚Äù and ‚Äúexclusively‚Äù and the negative are related to the words ‚Äúis not apprehended,‚Äù as taught, in a manner not as stated.

original: gang du gzhan gyi sgo nas med pa ma yin pa der 'di rang bzhin mi dmigs pa yin no zhes pa'i don no //
analyzed: gang du gzhan gyi sgo nas med pa ma yin pa der 'di rang bzhin mi dmigs pa yin no zhes pa'i don no //
translated: The meaning of the statement ‚Äúwhere it is not nonexistent in terms of the other, there is non-apprehension of intrinsic reality‚Äù is this.

original: 'di ni rnam pa bzhi yin par bstan to //
analyzed: 'di ni rnam pa bzhi yin par bstan to //
translated: It is taught that there are four kinds of non-apprehension.

original: gal te yang gsum snang ba mi dmigs pa'i dbye ba yin la /
analyzed: gal te yang gsum snang ba mi dmigs pa'i dbye ba yin la /
translated: Even though the three kinds of non-apprehension are distinguished in terms of the non-apprehension of appearance,

original: de dang ldan pa rang gi bye brag gi nang du bgrang ba ma yin pa de lta na yang mi dmigs pa tsam spyi'i dbang du byas nas rnam pa bzhi po 'di de'i yin par bstan to //
analyzed: de dang ldan pa rang gi bye brag gi nang du bgrang ba ma yin pa de lta na yang mi dmigs pa tsam spyi'i dbang du byas nas rnam pa bzhi po 'di de'i yin par bstan to //
translated: and the fourth kind of non-apprehension is not counted among the specific kinds of non-apprehension, still, in terms of mere non-apprehension, all four are taught to be non-apprehension.

original: 'o na de mi snang ba mi dmigs par 'gyur ro zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: 'o na de mi snang ba mi dmigs par 'gyur ro zhe na ma yin te /
translated: But if it is non-appearance, it is non-apprehension!

original: 'gal na de'i dbye ba can ma yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: 'gal na de'i dbye ba can ma yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: If it were contradictory, it would not be a kind of non-apprehension.

original: rta ngang pa la sogs pa pa lang nyid kyi bzhin no //
analyzed: rta ngang pa la sogs pa pa lang nyid kyi bzhin no //
translated: It would be like the non-apprehension of a horse in an ox.

original: des na dngos po la snang ba ma dmigs pa yin yang 'di ni nye bar dgod pa'i tshul yin no //
analyzed: des na dngos po la snang ba ma dmigs pa yin yang 'di ni nye bar dgod pa'i tshul yin no //
translated: Therefore, although it is non-apprehension of appearance in a thing, this is the way it is presented.

original: gal te rang bzhin mi dmigs pa tha snyad sgrub par byed pa nyid du rtogs pa nyid yin pa de lta na yang 'dir 'di khongs su 'du ba'i sbyor ba gzhan nyid du bstan pa des na rnam par dpyod par 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: gal te rang bzhin mi dmigs pa tha snyad sgrub par byed pa nyid du rtogs pa nyid yin pa de lta na yang 'dir 'di khongs su 'du ba'i sbyor ba gzhan nyid du bstan pa des na rnam par dpyod par 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: If you think that the non-observation of a nature is itself the means of establishing a convention, and that in that case, since it is taught as another type of inclusion, it is therefore to be analyzed,

original: ci 'di rang gi ngo bo ji lta ba bzhin nang du 'dus par bsgrub bya nye bar sdud dam /üîΩ'on te de'i bdag nyid 'dzin tam de ste bsgrub par bya ba'i don mtshungs pa'i phyir 'di dpyad par bya ba yin zhes dogs na khongs su 'du bar bstan pa yin yang thams cad kyis bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa rang gi rang bzhin ji
analyzed: ci 'di rang gi ngo bo ji lta ba bzhin nang du 'dus par bsgrub bya nye bar sdud dam / 'on te de'i bdag nyid 'dzin tam de ste bsgrub par bya ba'i don mtshungs pa'i phyir 'di dpyad par bya ba yin zhes dogs na khongs su 'du bar bstan pa yin yang thams cad kyis bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa rang gi rang bzhin ji
translated: then, is it the case that the object to be established is included in the nature just as it is?üîΩOr is it that the nature is apprehended as that? Or is it that since the object to be established is similar to it, it is to be analyzed?

original: lta ba nyid du ston to //
analyzed: lta ba nyid du ston to //
translated: Although it is taught as inclusion, it is taught by all that the object to be established and the means of establishing it are the nature just as it is.

original: de la ni zhes bya ba rang bzhin mi dmigs pas ni yul can tha snyad sgrub par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de la ni zhes bya ba rang bzhin mi dmigs pas ni yul can tha snyad sgrub par byed pa yin no //
translated: The non-observation of a nature is the subject that establishes a convention.

original: 'ba' zhig tu zad do zhes bya ba ni dngos po med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi yul ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'ba' zhig tu zad do zhes bya ba ni dngos po med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi yul ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: it is not the case that the object has the characteristic of non-existence.

original: ji skad brjod pa yin te gal te yang 'dir bye brag 'ga' zhig nang du 'du ba yin pa de lta na yang /
analyzed: ji skad brjod pa yin te gal te yang 'dir bye brag 'ga' zhig nang du 'du ba yin pa de lta na yang /
translated: What is said? Even if some distinction is included here,

original: gang gis @48b bsgrub bya tha mi dad par 'gyur ba de gnyis gcig nyid ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gang gis @48b bsgrub bya tha mi dad par 'gyur ba de gnyis gcig nyid ni ma yin gyi /
translated: those two are not the same, by which the probandum would become non-different.

original: 'on kyang mi 'dra ba yod kyang cung zad chos mthun pa tsam la brten nas khongs su 'du bar bstan to //
analyzed: 'on kyang mi 'dra ba yod kyang cung zad chos mthun pa tsam la brten nas khongs su 'du bar bstan to //
translated: However, even though there is a difference, it is shown that it is included based on just a slight similarity of attributes.

original: brjod par bya ba yod pa yin yang de ltar nye bar bstan pa ni mdo zor yang bar bya ba'i don gyi phyir ro //
analyzed: brjod par bya ba yod pa yin yang de ltar nye bar bstan pa ni mdo zor yang bar bya ba'i don gyi phyir ro //
translated: Even though the object of expression exists, it is taught in that way for the purpose of making the s≈´tra brief.

original: da ni 'di'i khongs su 'dus pa'i bye brag 'di la yang zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: da ni 'di'i khongs su 'dus pa'i bye brag 'di la yang zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: Now, here in this inclusion, he says also.

original: yul du gyur pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs pa la'o //
analyzed: yul du gyur pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs pa la'o //
translated: In the non-apprehension of the nature that is the object.

original: yul dang yul can gyi ngo bo yang khongs su 'du ba la ltos nas so //
analyzed: yul dang yul can gyi ngo bo yang khongs su 'du ba la ltos nas so //
translated: Also in terms of the inclusion of the nature of the object and subject.

original: gang gi tshe khyab par byed pa'i chos mi dmigs pas khyab par bya ba med pa ston pa de'i tshe ni med pa yang bsgrub bya yin no //
analyzed: gang gi tshe khyab par byed pa'i chos mi dmigs pas khyab par bya ba med pa ston pa de'i tshe ni med pa yang bsgrub bya yin no //
translated: When one demonstrates the absence of the pervaded by the non-apprehension of the pervader, then the absence is the probandum.

original: des na rang bzhin mi dmigs pa ni tha snyad sgrub pa yin la /
analyzed: des na rang bzhin mi dmigs pa ni tha snyad sgrub pa yin la /
translated: Therefore, the non-apprehension of intrinsic nature is the proof of a convention.

original: de'i khongs su 'du ba khyad par byed pa mi dmigs pa ni med pa sgrub par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i khongs su 'du ba khyad par byed pa mi dmigs pa ni med pa sgrub par byed pa yin no //
translated: The non-apprehension of a qualifier included in that is the proof of an absence.

original: gal te gang zhig sgrub pa'am bkag pas don gzhan dngos po med par grub par bstan pa de med do zhes bya bar rtogs pa'i yul nyid yin pa des na phyogs bzhin du de yang dngos po med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te gang zhig sgrub pa'am bkag pas don gzhan dngos po med par grub par bstan pa de med do zhes bya bar rtogs pa'i yul nyid yin pa des na phyogs bzhin du de yang dngos po med par 'gyur te /
translated: If it is taught that the absence of an entity is established by the proof or negation of something else, then that is the very object realized as ‚Äúnonexistent.‚Äù Therefore, like the position, that also would be an absence.

original: de lta ma yin na mi dmigs pa nyid du mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na mi dmigs pa nyid du mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Otherwise, it would not be established as non-apprehension.

original: des na 'di yang rang bzhin mi dmigs pa yin zhing 'dir yul can bsgrub par bya bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: des na 'di yang rang bzhin mi dmigs pa yin zhing 'dir yul can bsgrub par bya bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: Therefore, this is also the non-apprehension of intrinsic nature, and here the subject would be the probandum.

original: de ni bden mod kyi rten gzhan yod pa dang med pa dag gis tha dad pas bsgrub bya tha dad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ni bden mod kyi rten gzhan yod pa dang med pa dag gis tha dad pas bsgrub bya tha dad par 'gyur ro //
translated: That is true, but the probandum is different because of the difference of the other substrata, which exist or do not exist.

original: dngos po med pa rtogs pa la don gzhan bsgrub pa la sogs pa ltar de las gzhan la ni gzhan pa'i gzhan yod pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: dngos po med pa rtogs pa la don gzhan bsgrub pa la sogs pa ltar de las gzhan la ni gzhan pa'i gzhan yod pa ma yin gyi /
translated: In the cognition of nonexistence, as in the proof of another object, etc., there is no other existence apart from that.

original: de la ni 'gal ba bzhin phyogs kyang yod pa yin no //
analyzed: de la ni 'gal ba bzhin phyogs kyang yod pa yin no //
translated: But in that case, the position is as if there were an incompatibility.

original: de yang med pa nyid du rtogs pa yin pa'i phyir nyes pa 'ga' yang med do //
analyzed: de yang med pa nyid du rtogs pa yin pa'i phyir nyes pa 'ga' yang med do //
translated: And since that is also cognized as nonexistent, there is no fault at all.

original: gal te ma rtogs pa phyogs kyi bdag nyid du gyur pa'i med pa bsgrubs na sgrub pa sgrub par byed par 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te ma rtogs pa phyogs kyi bdag nyid du gyur pa'i med pa bsgrubs na sgrub pa sgrub par byed par 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
translated: If one proves the nonexistence that is the nature of the position, when it is not cognized, is not the proof a nonproof?

original: phyogs dang ni khyab par byed pa med pa la sogs pa med na mi 'byung ba 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: phyogs dang ni khyab par byed pa med pa la sogs pa med na mi 'byung ba 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: And if the position and the pervasion do not exist, etc., there is no invariable concomitance at all.

original: brjod pa med do zhes bya ba nyid du rtogs pa 'gal ba'i yul can nyid du skye ba na gang las 'di dag de mi dmigs pa nyid du 'gal ba la sogs pa yang yul nyid du rtogs par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: brjod pa med do zhes bya ba nyid du rtogs pa 'gal ba'i yul can nyid du skye ba na gang las 'di dag de mi dmigs pa nyid du 'gal ba la sogs pa yang yul nyid du rtogs par byed pa yin no //
translated: When the cognition arises with the object of the contradiction, ‚Äúinexpressible,‚Äù then from that, these are understood to be the objects of the contradiction, ‚Äúnon-apprehension,‚Äù etc.

original: des na dngos po la phyogs bzhin du de yul yin yang ji ltar rtogs bzhin pa'i phyogs nyid de stong par sems @49a * //
analyzed: des na dngos po la phyogs bzhin du de yul yin yang ji ltar rtogs bzhin pa'i phyogs nyid de stong par sems @49a * //
translated: Therefore, although the object is as it is, in accordance with the position, the position as it is understood is empty.

original: pa dgag par bya ba'i yul nyid dgag par bya bas stong bar rtogs pa na sngar ma rtogs par mi mthun pa yul du gyur pa'i phyir dngos po med pa grub pa yin no //
analyzed: pa dgag par bya ba'i yul nyid dgag par bya bas stong bar rtogs pa na sngar ma rtogs par mi mthun pa yul du gyur pa'i phyir dngos po med pa grub pa yin no //
translated: When the object of negation is understood to be empty, since it is an object that is not previously understood, it is a contradiction, and so non-existence is established.

original: des na sngar rtogs pa'i 'gal ba la sogs pa la ltos nas grub pa de nyid tha snyad kyi rang bzhin du gyur pa yin te /
analyzed: des na sngar rtogs pa'i 'gal ba la sogs pa la ltos nas grub pa de nyid tha snyad kyi rang bzhin du gyur pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, that which is established in dependence on the previously understood contradiction, etc., is the nature of the conventional.

original: yul grub pa zin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yul grub pa zin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the established object is completed.

original: de ltar 'gal ba dmigs pa la sogs pa la ni dngos po med pa dang dngos po med pa'i tha snyad gnyi ga bsgrub bya yin par brjod do //
analyzed: de ltar 'gal ba dmigs pa la sogs pa la ni dngos po med pa dang dngos po med pa'i tha snyad gnyi ga bsgrub bya yin par brjod do //
translated: Thus, in the case of the observation of contradiction, etc., both the non-existence and the expression of non-existence are the probandum.

original: phyogs la yang rang gi ngo bo ji lta ba bzhin mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyogs la yang rang gi ngo bo ji lta ba bzhin mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And in the case of the position, the non-engagement in the intrinsic nature is the probandum.

original: gang gi rtogs pa de la phyogs pa'i phyir byas pa nyid la sogs pa ltar dngos po sgrub par byed pas na 'dir yang gnyi ga sgrub par mi 'gyur ba tshad ma'i byed pa de'i mthar thug pa nyid ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gang gi rtogs pa de la phyogs pa'i phyir byas pa nyid la sogs pa ltar dngos po sgrub par byed pas na 'dir yang gnyi ga sgrub par mi 'gyur ba tshad ma'i byed pa de'i mthar thug pa nyid ni ma yin gyi /
translated: Since the proof of the thing is like the proof of the produced, etc., both are not established here. The finality of the operation of the valid cognition is not that,

original: 'on kyang rtogs pa de 'di na med do snyam pas 'jug par byed cing mthar ni phyogs la thug par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang rtogs pa de 'di na med do snyam pas 'jug par byed cing mthar ni phyogs la thug par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: but rather, one engages in the position thinking that the understanding is not here, and in the end one reaches the position.

original: phyogs tsam rtogs pas kyang med par rtogs pa'i phyir gnyi ga sgrub par byed pa nyid nyams pa med do //
analyzed: phyogs tsam rtogs pas kyang med par rtogs pa'i phyir gnyi ga sgrub par byed pa nyid nyams pa med do //
translated: Since one understands the non-existence by understanding just the position, there is no loss of the fact that both are established.

original: de ltar rnam pa 'dis dgag pa gang ji snyed pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa dgag pa'i yul can gyi mi dmigs pa 'di ni sbyor ba'i bye brag gis rnam pa bzhi yin no //
analyzed: de ltar rnam pa 'dis dgag pa gang ji snyed pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa dgag pa'i yul can gyi mi dmigs pa 'di ni sbyor ba'i bye brag gis rnam pa bzhi yin no //
translated: Thus, this non-observation of the object of negation, which is called ‚Äúwhatever negations by this mode,‚Äù etc., is fourfold due to the varieties of application.

original: sbyor ba'i bye brag ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: sbyor ba'i bye brag ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What are the varieties of application?

original: bshad pa / 'gal ba grub pa'i sbyor ba'i bye brag gis ni dper na 'di na grang ba'i reg pa med de zhes bya ba la grang ba nyid kyi reg pa ni grang ba'i reg pa ste /
analyzed: bshad pa / 'gal ba grub pa'i sbyor ba'i bye brag gis ni dper na 'di na grang ba'i reg pa med de zhes bya ba la grang ba nyid kyi reg pa ni grang ba'i reg pa ste /
translated: It is said: Due to the varieties of application establishing the contradictory, for example, ‚ÄúHere there is no cold touch,‚Äù where ‚Äúcold touch‚Äù is cold touch.

original: phyi rol gyi dngos po'o //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi dngos po'o //
translated: It is an external thing.

original: de 'di na med de de dang 'gal ba'i me grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de 'di na med de de dang 'gal ba'i me grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It does not exist here because fire, which is contradictory with it, is established.

original: 'gal ba dmigs pa'i sbyor ba 'dis ni khyab par bya ba med par bsgrub pa la de'i khyab par byed pa gang yin pa de dang 'gal ba dmigs pa yang bshad par rig par bya ste /
analyzed: 'gal ba dmigs pa'i sbyor ba 'dis ni khyab par bya ba med par bsgrub pa la de'i khyab par byed pa gang yin pa de dang 'gal ba dmigs pa yang bshad par rig par bya ste /
translated: By this application observing the contradictory, it should be understood that the establishment of the absence of the pervaded is also explained by observing the contradictory of that which is the pervader.

original: 'gal ba dmigs pa'i khongs su 'dus par gyur pa nyid du brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'gal ba dmigs pa'i khongs su 'dus par gyur pa nyid du brjod pa yin no //
translated: It is said to be included within observing the contradictory.

original: de nyid ston pa ni dper na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid ston pa ni dper na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The demonstration of that is ‚ÄúFor example.‚Äù

original: ba mo dang 'brel pa'i reg pa ni ba mo'i reg pa ste grang ba'i reg pa'o //
analyzed: ba mo dang 'brel pa'i reg pa ni ba mo'i reg pa ste grang ba'i reg pa'o //
translated: The contact associated with cold is the contact of cold, i.e., cold contact.

original: grang bas khyab pa de ni grang ba dang 'gal ba'i mes grang ba bsal na khyab par byed pa med pa'i phyir med pa rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: grang bas khyab pa de ni grang ba dang 'gal ba'i mes grang ba bsal na khyab par byed pa med pa'i phyir med pa rtogs pa yin no //
translated: When the cold is removed by fire, which is incompatible with cold, the absence of the pervader is understood because the pervader is absent.

original: gnyis pa yang sbyor ba'i bye brag gis ston te dgag par bya ba grang ba'i reg pa dang @49b 'gal ba me'i 'bras bur gyur pa du ba dmigs pas me nye bar 'jog pa na grang ba'i reg pa med par rtogs par byed do //
analyzed: gnyis pa yang sbyor ba'i bye brag gis ston te dgag par bya ba grang ba'i reg pa dang @49b 'gal ba me'i 'bras bur gyur pa du ba dmigs pas me nye bar 'jog pa na grang ba'i reg pa med par rtogs par byed do //
translated: The second is demonstrated by a difference in application. When fire is posited as the result of fire, which is incompatible with the object of negation, cold contact, through the perception of smoke, one understands the absence of cold contact.

original: rgyu ma grub pa ni zhes bya ba ni gsum pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu ma grub pa ni zhes bya ba ni gsum pa'o //
translated: The third is ‚Äúwhen the cause is not established.‚Äù

original: dper na 'di na zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: dper na 'di na zhes bya ba la /
translated: For example, ‚Äúhere‚Äù

original: mtsho chen po la sogs pa'i yul ni snga ma dag gis bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: mtsho chen po la sogs pa'i yul ni snga ma dag gis bstan pa yin no //
translated: the place, such as a great lake, is demonstrated by the previous [lines].

original: bzhi pa yang rang bzhin ma grub pa ni zhes bya ba rang bzhin mi dmigs pas ni dper na 'di na du ba med de mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: bzhi pa yang rang bzhin ma grub pa ni zhes bya ba rang bzhin mi dmigs pas ni dper na 'di na du ba med de mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: The fourth is like ‚ÄúThe nature of the hill is not established,‚Äù where the non-observation of nature is like ‚ÄúThere is no smoke here because it is not observed.‚Äù

original: 'di'i nang du 'dus pa'i sbyor ba gzhan yang ston pa ni 'dis ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di'i nang du 'dus pa'i sbyor ba gzhan yang ston pa ni 'dis ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The other syllogisms included in this are shown by ‚ÄúThis is like . . .‚Äù

original: khyad par byed pa dang 'brel pa'i rang bzhin yin no //
analyzed: khyad par byed pa dang 'brel pa'i rang bzhin yin no //
translated: The nature is related to the qualifier.

original: dper zhes bya ba la 'di na shing sha pa med do zhes bya ba ni khyab par bya ba med do bsgrub par bya ste /
analyzed: dper zhes bya ba la 'di na shing sha pa med do zhes bya ba ni khyab par bya ba med do bsgrub par bya ste /
translated: ‚ÄúLike‚Äù means that ‚ÄúThere is no shasha here‚Äù is a syllogism proving the absence of the pervaded.

original: khyad par ni nye ba la sogs pa bsten nas 'dzin pas mngon sum gyis mi rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par ni nye ba la sogs pa bsten nas 'dzin pas mngon sum gyis mi rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The qualifier is not apprehended by perception because it is apprehended in dependence on the proximity, etc., of the object.

original: shing med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni khyab par bya ba med par sgrub par byed pa ste /
analyzed: shing med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni khyab par bya ba med par sgrub par byed pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúBecause there is no tree‚Äù is a syllogism proving the absence of the pervader.

original: lo ma la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i ngo bo ni rgyang ring po nas kyang rtogs pas ma rtogs na med par khong du chud pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lo ma la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i ngo bo ni rgyang ring po nas kyang rtogs pas ma rtogs na med par khong du chud pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The nature of possessing leaves, etc., is apprehended from a distance, so if it is not apprehended, the absence of the pervader is understood.

original: des na yul 'di tsam na shing yod na dmigs par 'gyur la khyad par ni ma yin no snyam pa'i shes pa khyad par dgag par 'dod pa ni spyi med pa nyid kyis khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa las med par rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: des na yul 'di tsam na shing yod na dmigs par 'gyur la khyad par ni ma yin no snyam pa'i shes pa khyad par dgag par 'dod pa ni spyi med pa nyid kyis khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa las med par rtogs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, if a tree were present in this much space, it would be perceived, but it is not. The cognition that thinks, ‚ÄúThere is no tree here,‚Äù is the cognition that realizes nonexistence by the nonapprehension of the pervader, because there is no universal.

original: gal te gzhan du med pa grub pa mi srid pas snang ba mi dmigs pa las sbyor ba tha dad pa tsam zhig 'dir bstan par bya ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te gzhan du med pa grub pa mi srid pas snang ba mi dmigs pa las sbyor ba tha dad pa tsam zhig 'dir bstan par bya ba ma yin nam /
translated: If nonexistence elsewhere is not possible, is it not the case that the mere difference of application is taught here from the nonapprehension of appearance?

original: ji skad bstan pa'i sbyor ba dag la go ji ltar snang ba mi dmigs pa srid de gang gi phyir 'di la chod pa dang / bskal pa la sogs pa mi snang ba'i rgyu yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ji skad bstan pa'i sbyor ba dag la go ji ltar snang ba mi dmigs pa srid de gang gi phyir 'di la chod pa dang / bskal pa la sogs pa mi snang ba'i rgyu yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: How is it possible that the applications as taught are nonapprehension of appearance, because there is a cause for the nonappearance of this, such as obstruction and separation?

original: bltar mi rung ba la ni snang ba mi dmigs pa ma yin no //üîΩsnang ba mi dmigs pa nyid na yang ma grub pa nyid de /
analyzed: bltar mi rung ba la ni snang ba mi dmigs pa ma yin no // snang ba mi dmigs pa nyid na yang ma grub pa nyid de /
translated: It is not that the nonapprehension of appearance is not possible for what is not suitable to appear.

original: chod pas khyad par ma grub pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: chod pas khyad par ma grub pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Even if the nonapprehension of appearance is established, it is not established, because the difference of obstruction is not established.

original: 'di spangs pa'i phyir med pa dang tha snyad ces smos so //
analyzed: 'di spangs pa'i phyir med pa dang tha snyad ces smos so //
translated: The words ‚Äúnon-existence‚Äù and ‚Äúverbal designation‚Äù are used to exclude this.

original: khongs su 'du ba dang bcas pa'i sbyor ba med pa dang / med pa dang / med pa'i tha snyad ni med pa dang tha snyad de de sgrub pa'i mi dmigs pa 'di thams cad la ma grub pa mi dmigs par yang rig par bya'o //
analyzed: khongs su 'du ba dang bcas pa'i sbyor ba med pa dang / med pa dang / med pa'i tha snyad ni med pa dang tha snyad de de sgrub pa'i mi dmigs pa 'di thams cad la ma grub pa mi dmigs par yang rig par bya'o //
translated: The non-existence of the application of inclusion, the non-existence of verbal designation, and the verbal designation of non-existence are all non-existence and verbal designation. This non-apprehension which establishes them is to be known as the non-apprehension of the non-established.

original: 'dir grub pa dang ma grub par bya ba la phan tshun sdud pa'i phyir ma grub pa grub pa la ltos nas sdud cing grub pa @50a * //
analyzed: 'dir grub pa dang ma grub par bya ba la phan tshun sdud pa'i phyir ma grub pa grub pa la ltos nas sdud cing grub pa @50a * //
translated: Here, the established and the non-established are mutually included in order to assist each other. The non-established is included in the established, and the established is included in the non-established.

original: yang ma grub pa la ltos nas sdud par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: yang ma grub pa la ltos nas sdud par rig par bya'o //
translated: This should be understood.

original: gang dag ce na de dag ces smos so //
analyzed: gang dag ce na de dag ces smos so //
translated: What are they? The words ‚Äúthose‚Äù refer to them.

original: mi dmigs pa'i rnam pa'am mtha' dag gis dgag par bya ba dag go //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa'i rnam pa'am mtha' dag gis dgag par bya ba dag go //
translated: They are the objects of negation by the entire form of non-apprehension.

original: gal te yang chod pa la sogs pas grang ba la sogs pa snang ba ma yin pa de lta yang snang ba nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gal te yang chod pa la sogs pas grang ba la sogs pa snang ba ma yin pa de lta yang snang ba nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: Even though cold, etc. are not perceived due to obstruction, etc., they should be understood as perceptible.

original: des na grub par yang rig par bya'o //
analyzed: des na grub par yang rig par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, they should be understood as established.

original: gtan tshigs grub pa nyid du nges par bya ba'i ma grub pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gtan tshigs grub pa nyid du nges par bya ba'i ma grub pa ni ma yin no //
translated: The non-establishment of the reason is not ascertained as established.

original: gtan tshigs de dag nyid grub pa'i yul nyid du ston pa ni de dag dang 'gal ba dag ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: gtan tshigs de dag nyid grub pa'i yul nyid du ston pa ni de dag dang 'gal ba dag ces bya ba'o //
translated: The demonstration of the very objects of the establishment of those reasons is ‚Äútheir opposites.‚Äù

original: 'dir de dang 'gal ba la sogs pa snang ba mi dmigs pa'i rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs brjod pa gang yin pa de dag ni snang ba mi dmigs pa nyid du grub pa'i phyir ma grub pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dir de dang 'gal ba la sogs pa snang ba mi dmigs pa'i rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs brjod pa gang yin pa de dag ni snang ba mi dmigs pa nyid du grub pa'i phyir ma grub pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: Here, those reasons which are stated to have the nature of the non-apprehension of the appearance of their opposites are not non-established because the non-apprehension of the appearance of those is established.

original: gal te yang 'dir khyab par byed pa med pa la sogs pa 'gal ba ma yin pa de lta na yang 'dir dbyig thogs 'gro'o zhes bya ba bzhin du 'gal ba'i sgra 'jug pa yin te /
analyzed: gal te yang 'dir khyab par byed pa med pa la sogs pa 'gal ba ma yin pa de lta na yang 'dir dbyig thogs 'gro'o zhes bya ba bzhin du 'gal ba'i sgra 'jug pa yin te /
translated: Even if the absence of the pervasion, etc., here is not contradictory, in that case, the word ‚Äúcontradictory‚Äù is used here like ‚Äúone who goes with a club.‚Äù

original: dang po nyid kyi thams cad nye bar mtshon pa ni 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dang po nyid kyi thams cad nye bar mtshon pa ni 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the indication of all at the very beginning is tenable.

original: yang na khyab par byed pa med pa la sogs pa khyab par bya ba la sogs pa dang 'gal ba nyid de lhan cig mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang na khyab par byed pa med pa la sogs pa khyab par bya ba la sogs pa dang 'gal ba nyid de lhan cig mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Or else, the pervasion is contradictory, because the pervader and the pervaded are not possible together.

original: sgrub pa khong du chud pa ma yin pas 'gal ba dmigs pa ma yin yang 'gal bar byed pa brjod pa gsal bar mi srid pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: sgrub pa khong du chud pa ma yin pas 'gal ba dmigs pa ma yin yang 'gal bar byed pa brjod pa gsal bar mi srid pa ni ma yin no //
translated: The contradictory observation is not established by the non-understanding of the proof, but the expression of the contradictory is not impossible to state.

original: gang las gtan tshigs grub par 'gyur ba ji lta na 'di bltar rung ba'i bdag nyid dag kho na ma grub pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: gang las gtan tshigs grub par 'gyur ba ji lta na 'di bltar rung ba'i bdag nyid dag kho na ma grub pa yin zhe na /
translated: From what is the proof of the reason? How is it that only the visible natures are not established?

original: gzhan dag la ni zhes smos so //
analyzed: gzhan dag la ni zhes smos so //
translated: Others say that

original: bltar mi rung ba dag la ni ji skad bshad pa'i med pa dang 'gal ba mi 'grub bo //
analyzed: bltar mi rung ba dag la ni ji skad bshad pa'i med pa dang 'gal ba mi 'grub bo //
translated: the non-visible are not established as the non-existence and contradiction as explained.

original: med pa ni 'gal ba grub pa'i yan lag nyid du bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: med pa ni 'gal ba grub pa'i yan lag nyid du bstan pa yin no //
translated: Non-existence is taught as a part of the establishment of contradiction.

original: de'i don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de'i don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of that is this:

original: gal te dngos po de de'i tshe bskal pa de lta na yang 'dir mi dmigs pa ni mi mthun pa'i zla dngos po gzhan yod pa yin no zhes brjod la /
analyzed: gal te dngos po de de'i tshe bskal pa de lta na yang 'dir mi dmigs pa ni mi mthun pa'i zla dngos po gzhan yod pa yin no zhes brjod la /
translated: If that thing is at that time, in that case, this non-observation is the existence of another thing that is not compatible.

original: de yang 'gal ba la sogs pa nyid do //
analyzed: de yang 'gal ba la sogs pa nyid do //
translated: Moreover, it is just contradiction, etc.

original: de yang bltar rung ba'i dngos po'i mi mthun pa'i zla ba nyid kyis snang ba mi dmigs pa nyid du grub pa kho na ste /
analyzed: de yang bltar rung ba'i dngos po'i mi mthun pa'i zla ba nyid kyis snang ba mi dmigs pa nyid du grub pa kho na ste /
translated: Moreover, the non-apprehension of the appearance of that which is suitable to appear is just the establishment of the contradiction, etc.

original: de lta ma yin na 'gal ba nyid du ma grub par thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na 'gal ba nyid du ma grub par thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Otherwise, it would follow that the contradiction would not be established.

original: mi 'dod pa gsal bas sbyor ba gzhan nang du bsdu ba'i phyir gal te zhes smos so //
analyzed: mi 'dod pa gsal bas sbyor ba gzhan nang du bsdu ba'i phyir gal te zhes smos so //
translated: In order to include the other syllogisms within this one, he says, ‚ÄúIf you accept that the non-apprehension of the appearance of that which is suitable to appear is the establishment of the contradiction, etc.‚Äù

original: 'gal ba'i 'bras bu bzhin du 'gal ba'i rgyus kyang 'gal ba kho @50b na ste /
analyzed: 'gal ba'i 'bras bu bzhin du 'gal ba'i rgyus kyang 'gal ba kho @50b na ste /
translated: Just as there is contradiction through a contradictory effect, so there is also contradiction through a contradictory cause.

original: de lta ma yin na 'gal ba nye bar 'jog pa na 'bras bu las rgyu bzhin du rgyu las kyang 'bras bu grub pa'i phyir grang ba yod par sgrub par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar bsam pa'o //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na 'gal ba nye bar 'jog pa na 'bras bu las rgyu bzhin du rgyu las kyang 'bras bu grub pa'i phyir grang ba yod par sgrub par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar bsam pa'o //
translated: Otherwise, when the contradiction is posited, it would follow that the cause would be established from the effect, just as the effect is established from the cause. Thus, the existence of cold would be established. This is the idea.

original: rtsod pa 'di bsal ba'i phyir mdo de dang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rtsod pa 'di bsal ba'i phyir mdo de dang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: In order to dispel this objection, he says, ‚ÄúThe statement in the sutra.‚Äù

original: grang ba'i reg pa de dang 'gal ba ni me yin la /
analyzed: grang ba'i reg pa de dang 'gal ba ni me yin la /
translated: Fire is the contradiction of that cold sensation.

original: de'i rgyu mtshan ni shing la sogs pa ste de dmigs par sbyor ba gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: de'i rgyu mtshan ni shing la sogs pa ste de dmigs par sbyor ba gang yin pa'o //
translated: The reason is that the object, such as a tree, is the objective support of the application.

original: 'gal ba dang 'bras bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i med don can zhes bya bar 'brel to //
analyzed: 'gal ba dang 'bras bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i med don can zhes bya bar 'brel to //
translated: The meaning of non-existence is connected with the words ‚Äúcontradictory‚Äù and ‚Äúeffect,‚Äù etc.

original: med pa de yang de dang 'gal ba gang yin pa de nyid do //
analyzed: med pa de yang de dang 'gal ba gang yin pa de nyid do //
translated: And that non-existence is just that which is contradictory to it.

original: de ni 'khrul pa can yin no //
analyzed: de ni 'khrul pa can yin no //
translated: That is mistaken.

original: grang ba med pa'i don du grang ba dang 'gal ba me'i rgyu mtshan dmigs pa ni de la 'khrul pa can yin no //
analyzed: grang ba med pa'i don du grang ba dang 'gal ba me'i rgyu mtshan dmigs pa ni de la 'khrul pa can yin no //
translated: The objective support of the reason of fire, which is contradictory to cold, for the sake of the meaning of non-cold, is mistaken with respect to that.

original: ci thams cad kyi tshe 'am zhe na ma yin no zhes bshad pa ni /
analyzed: ci thams cad kyi tshe 'am zhe na ma yin no zhes bshad pa ni /
translated: Is it at all times? No, it is explained:

original: rgyu mtshan dag ni 'gal ba nyid med na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan dag ni 'gal ba nyid med na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: When there is no contradiction of the reasons.

original: me dang grang ba gnyis kyi rgyu mtshan gnyis 'gal ba med na'o //
analyzed: me dang grang ba gnyis kyi rgyu mtshan gnyis 'gal ba med na'o //
translated: When there is no contradiction of the two reasons, fire and cold.

original: des na de ltar 'gal ba'i rgyu mtshan dmigs pa gtan tshigs ma yin gyi 'gal ba ni ma yin no zhes brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: des na de ltar 'gal ba'i rgyu mtshan dmigs pa gtan tshigs ma yin gyi 'gal ba ni ma yin no zhes brjod pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is said that the objective support of a contradictory reason is not a reason, but it is not contradictory.

original: gang gis me'i rgyu'i nye ba tsam gyis 'grub pa'i phyir 'gal ba'i rgyu mi dmigs pa med pa'i don can du 'gyur ba 'bras bu'i rgyu bzhin du rgyus kyang 'bras bu nye bar 'jog pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gis me'i rgyu'i nye ba tsam gyis 'grub pa'i phyir 'gal ba'i rgyu mi dmigs pa med pa'i don can du 'gyur ba 'bras bu'i rgyu bzhin du rgyus kyang 'bras bu nye bar 'jog pa ni ma yin no //
translated: because the effect is established merely by the presence of the cause of fire, and the cause of the contradictory effect is not non-existent, as in the case of the cause of the effect.

original: 'gal ba gang dag gi rgyu 'gal ba ni der 'gal ba'i rgyus rgyu bzlog pa na 'bras bu yang ldog par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'gal ba gang dag gi rgyu 'gal ba ni der 'gal ba'i rgyus rgyu bzlog pa na 'bras bu yang ldog par 'gyur ro //
translated: The cause of the contradictory effect is the cause of the contradictory effect. When the cause of the contradictory effect is negated there, the effect is also negated.

original: rgyu 'gal ba de med na ni 'khrul pa nyid do //
analyzed: rgyu 'gal ba de med na ni 'khrul pa nyid do //
translated: If the cause of the contradictory effect does not exist, there is error.

original: 'khrul pa nyid mdo 'grel pas ston pa ni /
analyzed: 'khrul pa nyid mdo 'grel pas ston pa ni /
translated: The Commentary on the S≈´tra shows error:

original: dper na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dper na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: For example.

original: 'di na grang ba'i reg pa med de zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di na grang ba'i reg pa med de zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'o //
translated: Here there is no cold touch, this is what is to be established.

original: shing yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni sgrub par byed pa rgyu 'gal ba dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: shing yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni sgrub par byed pa rgyu 'gal ba dmigs pa'o //
translated: Because there is fire, this is the proof. The cause of the contradictory effect is observed.

original: shing yod pa tsam gyis ni grang ba med pa ma yin pa'i phyir me dang grang ba'i rgyu gnyis mi 'gal na 'khrul par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shing yod pa tsam gyis ni grang ba med pa ma yin pa'i phyir me dang grang ba'i rgyu gnyis mi 'gal na 'khrul par 'gyur ro //
translated: Because the mere presence of fire does not negate cold, if fire and cold were not contradictory causes, there would be error.

original: rgyu mtshan 'gal ba med na gtan tshigs nyid med pa mdor bshad pa rgyu mtshan 'gal na gtan tshigs nyid du 'gyur ro zhes ston pa ni rgyu mtshan dag 'gal na ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan 'gal ba med na gtan tshigs nyid med pa mdor bshad pa rgyu mtshan 'gal na gtan tshigs nyid du 'gyur ro zhes ston pa ni rgyu mtshan dag 'gal na ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If there is no contradiction in the reason, then there is no reason at all.üîΩThe statement that if there is a contradiction in the reason, then there is a reason is ‚ÄúIf there is a contradiction in the reason.‚Äù

original: dgag par bya ba'i rgyu mtshan gang yin pa dang de dang 'gal ba'i rgyu mtshan rgyu 'gal ba nyid du nye bar bkod pa de gnyis 'gal na ni go bar byed pa kho na yin no //
analyzed: dgag par bya ba'i rgyu mtshan gang yin pa dang de dang 'gal ba'i rgyu mtshan rgyu 'gal ba nyid du nye bar bkod pa de gnyis 'gal na ni go bar byed pa kho na yin no //
translated: The reason that is to be refuted and the reason that is contradictory to it are both stated as being contradictory causes. If those two are contradictory, then it is an inference.

original: gang du bzhin zhe na /
analyzed: gang du bzhin zhe na /
translated: Where is it?

original: dper na zhes smos so //üîΩskyes bu 'di la grang bskyed pa'i spu @51a * //
analyzed: dper na zhes smos so // skyes bu 'di la grang bskyed pa'i spu @51a * //
translated: He says, ‚ÄúFor example.‚Äù

original: langs pa la sogs pa'i khyad par med do //
analyzed: langs pa la sogs pa'i khyad par med do //
translated: This person does not have the characteristics of shivering and so on that are produced by cold.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: me'i khyad par te /
analyzed: me'i khyad par te /
translated: Because of the difference in the fire.

original: bzlag par nus pa 'di la zhes ji skad brjod pa la de yod na de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bzlag par nus pa 'di la zhes ji skad brjod pa la de yod na de'i phyir ro //
translated: If it is a fire that is able to dispel the cold, then it is as stated.

original: 'gal ba spu langs pa dang / mes gdungs pa de dag gi rgyu me dang grang ba de gnyis kyang 'gal ba yin pa des na /
analyzed: 'gal ba spu langs pa dang / mes gdungs pa de dag gi rgyu me dang grang ba de gnyis kyang 'gal ba yin pa des na /
translated: The contradiction of shivering and being burned by fire is also a contradiction of the two causes of those two, fire and cold.

original: me las grang ba med pa de'i phyir de'i 'bras bu spu langs pa la sogs pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: me las grang ba med pa de'i phyir de'i 'bras bu spu langs pa la sogs pa med pa yin no //
translated: Because there is no cold in fire, therefore there is no horripilation, etc., which are its effects.

original: gal te 'dir tshul 'di ltar bzlog pa yin na rgyu mtshan gnyis 'gal ba nye bar mkho ba med kyi /
analyzed: gal te 'dir tshul 'di ltar bzlog pa yin na rgyu mtshan gnyis 'gal ba nye bar mkho ba med kyi /
translated: If this is the reversal here, then the two reasons are not required to be contradictory.

original: 'on kyang spu ldang ba la sogs pa'i rgyu grang ba nyid dang mi 'gal ba nyid yin te de nyid las grang ba med pas de'i 'bras bu 'gog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'on kyang spu ldang ba la sogs pa'i rgyu grang ba nyid dang mi 'gal ba nyid yin te de nyid las grang ba med pas de'i 'bras bu 'gog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: However, cold is not contradictory with the cause of horripilation, etc., because there is no cold in fire, and therefore its effect is refuted.

original: me'i rgyu mtshan nyid kyang don me de grang ba bsal ba nyid kyis spu langs pa la sogs pa zlog par byed kyi yongs su gdung ba 'jog pas ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: me'i rgyu mtshan nyid kyang don me de grang ba bsal ba nyid kyis spu langs pa la sogs pa zlog par byed kyi yongs su gdung ba 'jog pas ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The reason for fire is also not contradictory with the cause of horripilation, etc., because the meaning of fire is the exclusion of cold, and it does not establish heat.

original: de ltar bzlog na yang rgyu mtshan gnyis 'gal ba yan lag ma yin te yongs su gdung ba nyid kyis de dang 'gal ba spu langs pa la sogs pa bzlog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar bzlog na yang rgyu mtshan gnyis 'gal ba yan lag ma yin te yongs su gdung ba nyid kyis de dang 'gal ba spu langs pa la sogs pa bzlog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Even if it is reversed in this way, the two reasons are not contradictory, because heat, which is contradictory with cold, does not refute horripilation, etc.

original: me las yongs su gdung ba rtogs pas chod pas spu langs pa la sogs pa med par rtogs pa ni mi srid de rgyu tsam las mi rtogs pa'i phyir dang / mtha'i gnas skabs mi rtogs pa'i phyir dang ; mthu dang ldan pas byin gyis brlabs pa srid pa'i phyir rgyu las 'bras bu mi 'grub pas 'gal ba'i rgyu dmigs pa ni go bar byed pa ma yin pa nyid do //
analyzed: me las yongs su gdung ba rtogs pas chod pas spu langs pa la sogs pa med par rtogs pa ni mi srid de rgyu tsam las mi rtogs pa'i phyir dang / mtha'i gnas skabs mi rtogs pa'i phyir dang ; mthu dang ldan pas byin gyis brlabs pa srid pa'i phyir rgyu las 'bras bu mi 'grub pas 'gal ba'i rgyu dmigs pa ni go bar byed pa ma yin pa nyid do //
translated: Since the effect is not established from the cause, the observation of a contradictory cause is not a proof.

original: rgyu 'gal na rgyu 'gal ba dmigs par 'gyur gyi 'gal ba'i rgyu mi dmigs pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rgyu 'gal na rgyu 'gal ba dmigs par 'gyur gyi 'gal ba'i rgyu mi dmigs pa ni ma yin no //
translated: When the cause is contradictory, the observation of a contradictory cause is possible, but the nonobservation of a contradictory cause is not.

original: der rgyu mtshan dag ces brjod pa ni mi rigs pa brjod pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: der rgyu mtshan dag ces brjod pa ni mi rigs pa brjod pa yin no zhe na /
translated: Here, the statement ‚Äúthe reason is not stated‚Äù is a statement of the unreasonable.

original: brjod pa / 'gal ba'i rgyu dmigs pa dang / rgyu 'gal ba dmigs pa gnyis po 'di tshig zur gnyis su bstan pas bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: brjod pa / 'gal ba'i rgyu dmigs pa dang / rgyu 'gal ba dmigs pa gnyis po 'di tshig zur gnyis su bstan pas bstan pa yin te /
translated: We reply: These two, the observation of a contradictory cause and the observation of a cause that is contradictory, are taught as two separate parts.

original: tha snyad ni gnyi ga ltar dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha snyad ni gnyi ga ltar dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The conventional is observed in both cases.

original: de dang 'gal ba'i rgyu mtshan ni zhes bya ba 'gal ba'i rgyu dmigs pa'i dbang du byas nas rgyu mtshan dag 'gal na ni zhes bya bas de nyid khas blangs pa yin pa'i phyir dang / de nyid khongs su bsdu ba'i phyir de dang 'gal ba grub pa 'di yang gong du rgyu ma grub pa kho nas zhes rgyu 'gal ba dmigs pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dang 'gal ba'i rgyu mtshan ni zhes bya ba 'gal ba'i rgyu dmigs pa'i dbang du byas nas rgyu mtshan dag 'gal na ni zhes bya bas de nyid khas blangs pa yin pa'i phyir dang / de nyid khongs su bsdu ba'i phyir de dang 'gal ba grub pa 'di yang gong du rgyu ma grub pa kho nas zhes rgyu 'gal ba dmigs pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The reason that contradicts that isüîΩ. Since the reason is stated from the perspective of the observation of a contradictory cause, the statement ‚ÄúIf the reason contradicts that‚Äù accepts that.üîΩAnd since that is included within this, this establishment of the contradiction of that is also taught to be the observation of a contradictory cause alone, as stated above.üîΩThe word ‚Äúthat‚Äù refers to the cause that is stated to be unestablished, because it is the cause that is apprehended.

original: de zhes bya bas ni rgyu ma grub pa @51b nyid du smos pa'i rgyu gzung ba'i phyir de dang 'gal ba grub pa yin pas /üîΩrgyu 'gal ba dmigs pa nye bar bstan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de zhes bya bas ni rgyu ma grub pa @51b nyid du smos pa'i rgyu gzung ba'i phyir de dang 'gal ba grub pa yin pas / rgyu 'gal ba dmigs pa nye bar bstan par 'gyur ro //
translated: The establishment of the contradiction of that isüîΩ.

original: de nyid kyi phyir 'gal ba'i rgyu dmigs pa nyid ston pas grang ba dang 'gal ba me'i rgyu brjod do //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir 'gal ba'i rgyu dmigs pa nyid ston pas grang ba dang 'gal ba me'i rgyu brjod do //
translated: Therefore, the statement of the observation of a contradictory cause is taught by stating the cause of fire, which is contradictory to cold.

original: spu langs pa la sogs pa dang 'gal ba yongs su gdung pa'i rgyu nyid rtogs par bya ba'i phyir rgyu mtshan dag ces smos la /
analyzed: spu langs pa la sogs pa dang 'gal ba yongs su gdung pa'i rgyu nyid rtogs par bya ba'i phyir rgyu mtshan dag ces smos la /
translated: The reason is stated in order to understand the cause of complete burning, which is incompatible with the bristling of the hair, etc.

original: de dang 'gal ba ni rgyu 'gal ba dmigs pa nyid nye bar bstan pa'i bsam pas yin no //
analyzed: de dang 'gal ba ni rgyu 'gal ba dmigs pa nyid nye bar bstan pa'i bsam pas yin no //
translated: The incompatible is taught by the mere observation of the cause of the incompatible.

original: me las yongs su gdung ba skye ba'i gegs ni 'ga' yang rtogs pa med do //
analyzed: me las yongs su gdung ba skye ba'i gegs ni 'ga' yang rtogs pa med do //
translated: There is no understanding of any obstacle to the arising of complete burning from fire.

original: sreg pa'i nus pa nyid kyis yongs su gdung bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sreg pa'i nus pa nyid kyis yongs su gdung bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is complete burning that is done by the very capacity for burning.

original: de nyid kyis du ba skyed pa'i phyir me de mi dmigs na yongs su gdung bskyed pa'i nus pa thogs pa med pa rtogs pa na /
analyzed: de nyid kyis du ba skyed pa'i phyir me de mi dmigs na yongs su gdung bskyed pa'i nus pa thogs pa med pa rtogs pa na /
translated: When that fire is not observed because it produces smoke, then the unobstructed capacity to produce complete burning is understood.

original: yongs su gdung ba rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: yongs su gdung ba rtogs pa yin no //
translated: Complete burning is understood.

original: rgyu las 'bras bu rtogs par thal te /
analyzed: rgyu las 'bras bu rtogs par thal te /
translated: It follows that the effect is understood from the cause,

original: du ba las nus pa thogs pa med pa rtogs pa na yongs su gdung ba'i rtogs pa skye ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: du ba las nus pa thogs pa med pa rtogs pa na yongs su gdung ba'i rtogs pa skye ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: because when the unobstructed capacity is understood from smoke, the understanding of complete burning arises.

original: gal te thogs pa med pa nyid rjes su dpag pa kho nas yongs su gdung ba rtogs pa ma grub pa na 'gyur ro zhes pa tshogs pa gcig la rag las pa'i rjes su dpag par bshad par bya'o //üîΩ'dis ni skyed par byed pa'i me nyid grang ba sel bar byed pa yin na skyed par byed pa yang skyed par byed pa kho na yin no zhes mi rtogs te /
analyzed: gal te thogs pa med pa nyid rjes su dpag pa kho nas yongs su gdung ba rtogs pa ma grub pa na 'gyur ro zhes pa tshogs pa gcig la rag las pa'i rjes su dpag par bshad par bya'o // 'dis ni skyed par byed pa'i me nyid grang ba sel bar byed pa yin na skyed par byed pa yang skyed par byed pa kho na yin no zhes mi rtogs te /
translated: If it is not established that the absence of obstruction is understood by inference alone, then it should be explained that it is inferred in dependence on a single collection.

original: skyed par byed pa der nges pa'i khyad par mi rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhes 'gal ba dmigs pa la 'khrul par dogs pa yang bkag pa yin te /
analyzed: skyed par byed pa der nges pa'i khyad par mi rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhes 'gal ba dmigs pa la 'khrul par dogs pa yang bkag pa yin te /
translated: This also refutes the doubt of error in observing a contradiction, thinking, ‚ÄúIf the fire that produces heat is what removes cold, then the producer is only the producer,‚Äù

original: du ba skye ba nyid kyis dro ba'i nus pa thogs pa med pa rtogs pa na grang ba med par grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: du ba skye ba nyid kyis dro ba'i nus pa thogs pa med pa rtogs pa na grang ba med par grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because when the unobstructed capacity for heat is understood by the arising of smoke itself, cold is established as nonexistent.

original: 'o na 'gal ba'i 'bras bu dmigs pa nyid go bar byed par 'gyur ro zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: 'o na 'gal ba'i 'bras bu dmigs pa nyid go bar byed par 'gyur ro zhe na ma yin te /
translated: If it is asked, ‚ÄúThen would the observation of a contradictory effect itself be the proof?‚Äù no, it would not.

original: me'i khyad par yongs su bcad pa'i don yin pas na des mthar thug pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: me'i khyad par yongs su bcad pa'i don yin pas na des mthar thug pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the meaning of the determination of the particular of fire, and therefore it is not final.

original: tshul 'di grub pa la brten pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshul 'di grub pa la brten pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is based on the establishment of this method.

original: sbyor ba gzhan par grub po zhes ston pa ni /
analyzed: sbyor ba gzhan par grub po zhes ston pa ni /
translated: The demonstration of the establishment of another syllogism is:

original: 'dis ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'dis ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBy this‚Äù means:

original: de'o zhes bya ba 'gal ba'i rgyu me de'i 'bras bu de las kyang me de dang 'gal ba grang ba'i reg pa de'i 'bras bu spu langs pa de med par rtogs pa bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: de'o zhes bya ba 'gal ba'i rgyu me de'i 'bras bu de las kyang me de dang 'gal ba grang ba'i reg pa de'i 'bras bu spu langs pa de med par rtogs pa bshad pa yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù means: from the effect of that fire which is the cause of the contradictory, cold touch, the effect of that fire which is contradictory with it, horripilation, is understood to be absent.

original: dper na phyogs 'di na ba spu langs pa la sogs pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa yang yin la skyes bu yang @52a * //üîΩyin pa de lta bu can ma yin te /
analyzed: dper na phyogs 'di na ba spu langs pa la sogs pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa yang yin la skyes bu yang @52a * // yin pa de lta bu can ma yin te /
translated: For example, ‚ÄúIn this place, although there is the particular of horripilation, etc., there is no one who has it,

original: du ba yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba lta bu'o //üîΩdes na 'di ni 'gal ba'i rgyu'i 'bras bu dmigs pa'am /
analyzed: du ba yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba lta bu'o // des na 'di ni 'gal ba'i rgyu'i 'bras bu dmigs pa'am /
translated: because there is smoke.‚ÄùüîΩTherefore, this is the observation of the effect of the cause of the contradictory,

original: rgyu 'gal ba'i 'bras bu dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu 'gal ba'i 'bras bu dmigs pa'o //
translated: or the observation of the effect of the contradictory cause.

original: 'di nyid kyi khongs su bsdu ba bshad pa la /
analyzed: 'di nyid kyi khongs su bsdu ba bshad pa la /
translated: The explanation of the inclusion in this very [reasoning] is:

original: 'di yang zhes bya ba ni skabs su bab pa'o //
analyzed: 'di yang zhes bya ba ni skabs su bab pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThis‚Äù refers to the present context.

original: ci rgyu 'gal ba'i 'bras bu dmigs pa'am zhe na ma yin no zhes brjod pa ni de dang 'gal ba grub pa ste /
analyzed: ci rgyu 'gal ba'i 'bras bu dmigs pa'am zhe na ma yin no zhes brjod pa ni de dang 'gal ba grub pa ste /
translated: Is the effect of a contradictory cause observed? No, one should say, because the effect of a contradictory cause is established.

original: rgyu 'gal ba grub pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu 'gal ba grub pa'o //
translated: The effect of a contradictory cause is established.

original: rnam pa bzhir bltas par ni rgyu mi dmigs pa nyid du bstan pas /
analyzed: rnam pa bzhir bltas par ni rgyu mi dmigs pa nyid du bstan pas /
translated: The non-observation of a cause is taught as a type of the fourfold observation.

original: rgyu 'gal ba'i 'bras bu dmigs pa ni 'di'i khongs su 'du la /
analyzed: rgyu 'gal ba'i 'bras bu dmigs pa ni 'di'i khongs su 'du la /
translated: The observation of the effect of a contradictory cause is included in this category.

original: 'di ni rgyu mi dmigs pa'i khongs su 'du ba yin no //üîΩde ltar na gtso bo nye bar bstan pa de'i khongs su 'du ba tshul 'dis /
analyzed: 'di ni rgyu mi dmigs pa'i khongs su 'du ba yin no // de ltar na gtso bo nye bar bstan pa de'i khongs su 'du ba tshul 'dis /
translated: And this is included in the category of the non-observation of a cause.

original: snang ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni ji ltar bstan pa nyid kyis rnam pa brgyad du bgrang bar bya'o //
analyzed: snang ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni ji ltar bstan pa nyid kyis rnam pa brgyad du bgrang bar bya'o //
translated: Thus, this non-observation of appearance, as taught, should be counted as eight types, by the method of inclusion in the category of the principal one that is taught.

original: gal te ji ltar 'gal ba'i rgyu dmigs pa la rgyu tsam ni skyed par byed pa ma yin la tha ma'i gnas skabs kyang mi rtogs pa'i phyir 'khrul par dogs pas de tsam go bar byed pa ma yin pa brjod pa de bzhin du 'gal ba'i 'bras bu
analyzed: gal te ji ltar 'gal ba'i rgyu dmigs pa la rgyu tsam ni skyed par byed pa ma yin la tha ma'i gnas skabs kyang mi rtogs pa'i phyir 'khrul par dogs pas de tsam go bar byed pa ma yin pa brjod pa de bzhin du 'gal ba'i 'bras bu
translated: If you suspect that the cause of error is the observation of a cause that is incompatible with the effect, and that the cause alone is not the producer, and that the final state is not understood, and therefore that mere observation does not cause understanding, then in the same way,

original: dmigs pa yang 'bras bu go bar byed pa ma yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dmigs pa yang 'bras bu go bar byed pa ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: the observation of an effect that is incompatible with the cause would not cause understanding of the effect.

original: dus gzhan du byed pa'i phyir rgyu byed bzhin pa nyid ma yin pa ltar /
analyzed: dus gzhan du byed pa'i phyir rgyu byed bzhin pa nyid ma yin pa ltar /
translated: Just as the cause is not in the process of producing the effect because it is active at another time,

original: sngar nyid byas zin pa'i phyir 'bras bu yang bya bzhin pa ma yin par 'gyur te /
analyzed: sngar nyid byas zin pa'i phyir 'bras bu yang bya bzhin pa ma yin par 'gyur te /
translated: so too the effect is not in the process of being produced because it is already produced.

original: des na gnas pa thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na gnas pa thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, it would obtain endurance.

original: gnas pa thob pas rgyu nye bar gnas pa med kyang srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnas pa thob pas rgyu nye bar gnas pa med kyang srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is possible that it would obtain endurance even though the cause does not endure.

original: 'di ltar de'i tshe mi byed pa'i phyir rgyus 'bras bu nye bar 'jog pa ma yin pa de bzhin du 'bras bus kyang rgyu nye bar mi 'jog ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar de'i tshe mi byed pa'i phyir rgyus 'bras bu nye bar 'jog pa ma yin pa de bzhin du 'bras bus kyang rgyu nye bar mi 'jog ste /
translated: Just as the cause does not present the effect because it does not produce it at that time, so too the effect does not present the cause because it does not produce it at that time.

original: de'i tshe bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because at that time, it is not a thing.üîΩIn response to this qualm, he explains:

original: dogs pa 'di bsu nas bshad pa ni mi dmigs pa rnam pa brgyad po de la 'gal ba'i 'bras bu dmigs pa bshad pa gang yin pa de las te /
analyzed: dogs pa 'di bsu nas bshad pa ni mi dmigs pa rnam pa brgyad po de la 'gal ba'i 'bras bu dmigs pa bshad pa gang yin pa de las te /
translated: ‚ÄúIn the case of the eight types of non-observation, the observation of a contradictory effect is one of them.

original: der 'gal 'bras bu la yang ste 'gal ba'i rgyu dmigs pa 'ba' zhig la ni ma yin gyi ji srid du 'di la yang khyab par 'dod pa yin no //
analyzed: der 'gal 'bras bu la yang ste 'gal ba'i rgyu dmigs pa 'ba' zhig la ni ma yin gyi ji srid du 'di la yang khyab par 'dod pa yin no //
translated: The observation of a contradictory cause is not the only one; it is also the observation of an effect that is contradictory.

original: de nyid brjod pa ni /üîΩyul dang ni /
analyzed: de nyid brjod pa ni / yul dang ni /
translated: He states this very point:üîΩ‚ÄúIn the case of the observation of a contradictory effect,

original: dus la sogs pa la ltos par 'dod gang du gang gi gang du bskyed pa dang sogs pa smos pas ji ltar rtog par byed pa'i rang bzhin gyi khyad par ro //
analyzed: dus la sogs pa la ltos par 'dod gang du gang gi gang du bskyed pa dang sogs pa smos pas ji ltar rtog par byed pa'i rang bzhin gyi khyad par ro //
translated: the effect that is produced in a certain place, at a certain time, and so on, and the nature of the cause that is conceived in a certain way, as indicated by the word ‚Äòand so on,‚Äô are mutually exclusive.

original: ji skad brjod pa yin te /üîΩde las skyes pa gzhan gyi gzhan dbang du gyur pa ma @52b yin pa'i phyir nges par mi 'grub pas skye bzhin pa'i du ba nyid go bar byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: ji skad brjod pa yin te / de las skyes pa gzhan gyi gzhan dbang du gyur pa ma @52b yin pa'i phyir nges par mi 'grub pas skye bzhin pa'i du ba nyid go bar byed pa yin gyi /
translated: This is what is said.üîΩBecause the effect that is produced is not dependent on anything else, it is not established as a mere negation.

original: gnas pa'i gnas skabs ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gnas pa'i gnas skabs ni ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, the arising of smoke is the evidence, not the state of enduring.

original: de ni du ba'i skad cig snga ma la brten pa'i phyir me'i rgyu can ma yin pas na me med kyang yod pa'i phyir skye bzhin pa nyid kyang rgyun mi 'chad par gyen du 'phyur ba mang du mched cing 'phel ba dang ma bral ba de ltar 'phel
analyzed: de ni du ba'i skad cig snga ma la brten pa'i phyir me'i rgyu can ma yin pas na me med kyang yod pa'i phyir skye bzhin pa nyid kyang rgyun mi 'chad par gyen du 'phyur ba mang du mched cing 'phel ba dang ma bral ba de ltar 'phel
translated: Because it is dependent on the prior moment of smoke, it is not a cause of fire. Therefore, even when there is no fire, smoke exists. Thus, the arising of smoke is not interrupted. It spreads, increases, and expands.

original: ba bsten pa mi bzod pa rtogs nas rtogs par byed do //
analyzed: ba bsten pa mi bzod pa rtogs nas rtogs par byed do //
translated: In the same way, the opponent should understand that the effect is not dependent on the cause.

original: da ni yul dang dus smos pas ci bya zhe na khyad par gzhan gyis kyang de de'i yul dang dus can du rtogs par byed pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: da ni yul dang dus smos pas ci bya zhe na khyad par gzhan gyis kyang de de'i yul dang dus can du rtogs par byed pa'i phyir te /
translated: Now, what is the point of mentioning the object and time? It is because another distinction also causes one to understand that the effect has that as its object and time.

original: yul dang dus kyi khyad par can da nyid sgrub par byed pa yin pa'i phyir des bar du bcad pa nyid kyis rtogs pa'i phyir ro //üîΩde lta ma yin na 'khrul par dogs par 'gyur ro zhes bshad pa ni /
analyzed: yul dang dus kyi khyad par can da nyid sgrub par byed pa yin pa'i phyir des bar du bcad pa nyid kyis rtogs pa'i phyir ro // de lta ma yin na 'khrul par dogs par 'gyur ro zhes bshad pa ni /
translated: The distinction of object and time is established by the effect itself, because it is understood by the mere fact that it is obstructed by that.üîΩOtherwise, there would be doubt about error.

original: gzhan du zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan du zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is explained in the line ‚ÄúOtherwise, there would be doubt.‚Äù

original: de la mi ltos pa ni 'gal ba'i 'bras bu 'khrul par 'gyur te thal ba bzhin no //
analyzed: de la mi ltos pa ni 'gal ba'i 'bras bu 'khrul par 'gyur te thal ba bzhin no //
translated: In that case, the effect would be contradictory, like smoke.

original: de de las skye bzhin pa yin yang gnas pa'i gnas skabs na de la mi ltos pa dang / grub bzhin par rtogs par byed pa'i khyad par yang rtogs par mi nus pas grang ba med pa sgrub par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de de las skye bzhin pa yin yang gnas pa'i gnas skabs na de la mi ltos pa dang / grub bzhin par rtogs par byed pa'i khyad par yang rtogs par mi nus pas grang ba med pa sgrub par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: Although it is arising from that, it is not dependent on that at the time of enduring, and it is not possible to understand the distinction that makes it understood as being established. Therefore, it does not establish non-coldness.

original: des na 'di ltar gtan tshigs gsum tshul gsum dang ldan pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: des na 'di ltar gtan tshigs gsum tshul gsum dang ldan pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, because the three reasons have the three modes,

original: de ni rnam gsum nyid ces brjod pa de rang gi ngo bos rnam pa gsum pa'i mthar thug pa bkral nas gtan tshigs gzhan srid pa dgag pa'i don du rnam gsum nyid ces nges par bzung ba 'khrul par dogs pa bzlog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni rnam gsum nyid ces brjod pa de rang gi ngo bos rnam pa gsum pa'i mthar thug pa bkral nas gtan tshigs gzhan srid pa dgag pa'i don du rnam gsum nyid ces nges par bzung ba 'khrul par dogs pa bzlog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: it is said to be threefold. Having explained that it is ultimately threefold by nature, in order to refute the possibility of other reasons, it is ascertained as threefold. This is to avert the doubt of error.

original: 'o na zhes rtsod par byed do //
analyzed: 'o na zhes rtsod par byed do //
translated: Now, this is argued:

original: rjes su dpog par byed pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: rjes su dpog par byed pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is that which causes inference.

original: de gang zhe na /
analyzed: de gang zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: 'bras bu skye bar ro ;
analyzed: 'bras bu skye bar ro ;
translated: The arising of the effect.

original: / gang gis she na /
analyzed: / gang gis she na /
translated: By what?

original: rgyu la sogs pa ste rgyu gzhan la ltos pa med pa la sogs pa 'bras bu skye ba de ji ltar gtan tshigs rnam pa gsum gyi nang du 'du zhe na /
analyzed: rgyu la sogs pa ste rgyu gzhan la ltos pa med pa la sogs pa 'bras bu skye ba de ji ltar gtan tshigs rnam pa gsum gyi nang du 'du zhe na /
translated: How can the arising of an effect that is not dependent on other causes and so on be included among the three kinds of reasons?

original: thams cad du bsgrub bya rjes su dpog pa'i byed pa can gtan tshigs bstan pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs brjod pa yang bsgrub bya gtso bor bstan pa yin yang de'i rang gi ngo bo phal par byas pa yin te /
analyzed: thams cad du bsgrub bya rjes su dpog pa'i byed pa can gtan tshigs bstan pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs brjod pa yang bsgrub bya gtso bor bstan pa yin yang de'i rang gi ngo bo phal par byas pa yin te /
translated: In all cases, a reason is taught to be that which has the activity of inferring the probandum. Even when a reason is stated, the probandum is the primary focus. However, its own nature is secondary.

original: 'bras bu la sogs pa'i gtan tshigs ston pa ni /
analyzed: 'bras bu la sogs pa'i gtan tshigs ston pa ni /
translated: The teaching of reasons such as effect

original: 'di ni me yod de du ba yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: 'di ni me yod de du ba yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: is like ‚ÄúThere is fire here because there is smoke.‚Äù

original: des na rgyu tshogs pas 'bras bu skye bar rjes su dpog par byed pa gang yin pa de gang du 'du zhes bya @53a * //
analyzed: des na rgyu tshogs pas 'bras bu skye bar rjes su dpog par byed pa gang yin pa de gang du 'du zhes bya @53a * //
translated: Therefore, when one infers that an effect arises from the assembly of causes, how is that included among the three kinds of reasons?

original: bas ni gtan tshigs de nyid kyi khongs su 'du ba rtsod pa yin no //
analyzed: bas ni gtan tshigs de nyid kyi khongs su 'du ba rtsod pa yin no //
translated: This is a dispute about whether that reason is included among the three kinds of reasons.

original: tshogs pa las 'bras bu skye bar rjes su dpog pa na ni de dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshogs pa las 'bras bu skye bar rjes su dpog pa na ni de dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: When one infers the effect arising from the assemblage, it is because one observes that.

original: 'bras bu skye ba yin no zhes rjes su dpag par bya ba yin pa'i phyir rjes su dpag par bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu skye ba yin no zhes rjes su dpag par bya ba yin pa'i phyir rjes su dpag par bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Since the effect is to be inferred as arising, it is to be inferred.

original: slob dpon gyis ni ji skad brjod pa'i bsgrub bya mi srid pa'i phyir dang / srid pa'i bsgrub bya la yang rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs nyid du ston pas rgyu tshogs pa yis zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: slob dpon gyis ni ji skad brjod pa'i bsgrub bya mi srid pa'i phyir dang / srid pa'i bsgrub bya la yang rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs nyid du ston pas rgyu tshogs pa yis zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: The Acarya states that the reason is a natural one, because the probandum as stated is impossible, and because the possible probandum possesses the characteristics of a natural reason, and he states the reason in the form ‚Äúbecause the effect arises from the assemblage of causes.‚Äù

original: rgyu tshogs pa'i 'bras bu skye bar rjes su dpog pa gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin yin par brjod do //
analyzed: rgyu tshogs pa'i 'bras bu skye bar rjes su dpog pa gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin yin par brjod do //
translated: That which infers the effect arising from the assemblage of causes is called a natural reason.

original: skye ba ni rgyu yod pa'am 'bras bu nyid yin gyi bya ba'i bdag nyid can gzhan ni 'ga' yang med do //
analyzed: skye ba ni rgyu yod pa'am 'bras bu nyid yin gyi bya ba'i bdag nyid can gzhan ni 'ga' yang med do //
translated: Arising is either the cause or the effect itself; there is no other activity that is its nature.

original: des na 'bras bu la gnas pa'i rang bzhin gyi khyad par ram /
analyzed: des na 'bras bu la gnas pa'i rang bzhin gyi khyad par ram /
translated: Therefore, the difference that resides in the effect is the nature of the reason.

original: rgyu la gnas pa'i rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs khyad par yin no //
analyzed: rgyu la gnas pa'i rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs khyad par yin no //
translated: Or, the difference that resides in the cause is the nature of the reason.

original: de de la pha rol pos ni 'bras bu la gnas pa'i khyad par rjes su dpag par bya ba brjod pa na 'dir rgyu la gnas pa'i khyad par rjes su dpog pa na rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs su bshad do //
analyzed: de de la pha rol pos ni 'bras bu la gnas pa'i khyad par rjes su dpag par bya ba brjod pa na 'dir rgyu la gnas pa'i khyad par rjes su dpog pa na rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs su bshad do //
translated: When the opponent states that the difference that resides in the effect is to be inferred, here, when the difference that resides in the cause is inferred, it is explained to be a reason of nature.

original: rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid bshad pa ni /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid bshad pa ni /
translated: The definition of a reason of nature is stated:

original: don gzhan la ni mi ltos zhes bya'o //
analyzed: don gzhan la ni mi ltos zhes bya'o //
translated: It does not depend on another object.

original: rgyu la gnas pa'i 'bras bu skye ba'i mtshan nyid ni rgyu tshogs pa yod pa tsam las gzhan la mi ltos pa yin no //
analyzed: rgyu la gnas pa'i 'bras bu skye ba'i mtshan nyid ni rgyu tshogs pa yod pa tsam las gzhan la mi ltos pa yin no //
translated: The definition of the arising of an effect that resides in the cause is that it does not depend on anything other than the mere presence of the assemblage of causes.

original: des na rgyu tshogs pa'i rang bzhin ngo bo nyid de sha pa yod pa las gzhan la ltos pa'i shing nyid sha pa'i rang gi ngo bo yin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: des na rgyu tshogs pa'i rang bzhin ngo bo nyid de sha pa yod pa las gzhan la ltos pa'i shing nyid sha pa'i rang gi ngo bo yin pa bzhin no //
translated: Therefore, the nature of the assemblage of causes is the essence of the sprout. The tree itself, which depends on something other than the presence of the sprout, is the essence of the sprout, just as it is the essence of the tree.

original: rang gi ngo bo rjes su dpag par bya ba la ni ngo bo rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs yin no //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo rjes su dpag par bya ba la ni ngo bo rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs yin no //
translated: The essence of the object to be inferred is the natural reason.

original: 'di la lhan cig byed pa thams cad las dang po 'brel pa nyid kyi tshe /
analyzed: 'di la lhan cig byed pa thams cad las dang po 'brel pa nyid kyi tshe /
translated: Here, when all the cooperating causes are present for the first time,

original: 'bras bu mi skye bar dmigs nas phyis 'grub pa khyad par ma skyes pa ma yin pa dang / rigs kyis thob pa ma yin pa dang / mi mthun pa nyid las skye'o zhes nges par byed do//
analyzed: 'bras bu mi skye bar dmigs nas phyis 'grub pa khyad par ma skyes pa ma yin pa dang / rigs kyis thob pa ma yin pa dang / mi mthun pa nyid las skye'o zhes nges par byed do//
translated: one observes that the effect is not produced, and later, when it is produced, one ascertains that it is not produced from a non-arisen special quality, nor from a quality obtained by kind, nor from a contradictory quality.

original: khyad par thob pa la mi ltos na ni dang po 'brel ba nyid na yod par thal ba'i phyir dang / de las khyad par mi skyon phyis kyang med par 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / khyad par rigs kyis thob par ma grub na skad cig gnyis pa nyid las yod par thal ba'i phyir dang /
analyzed: khyad par thob pa la mi ltos na ni dang po 'brel ba nyid na yod par thal ba'i phyir dang / de las khyad par mi skyon phyis kyang med par 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / khyad par rigs kyis thob par ma grub na skad cig gnyis pa nyid las yod par thal ba'i phyir dang /
translated: If it did not depend on obtaining a special quality, it would follow that it would exist at the time of the first presence, and because a special quality would not be produced from that, it would not exist later either. And if it is not established that the special quality is obtained by kind, it would follow that it would exist even in the second moment.

original: gcig gnas pa don med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gcig gnas pa don med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is meaningless for one to remain.

original: de'i @53b phyir 'bras bu sgrub par byed pa ji srid bya ba byed pa la ltos pa de dag ni snga ma dang 'brel pa phyi ma phyi ma khyad par can dang ches khyad par can du sgrub par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i @53b phyir 'bras bu sgrub par byed pa ji srid bya ba byed pa la ltos pa de dag ni snga ma dang 'brel pa phyi ma phyi ma khyad par can dang ches khyad par can du sgrub par byed pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, those which are established as the effect-producer, as long as they depend on the performance of the action, are established as the subsequent special and more special in relation to the prior.

original: khyad par de ni 'bras bu bskyed pa'i ming can rung ba zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: khyad par de ni 'bras bu bskyed pa'i ming can rung ba zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: That special is called ‚Äúsuitable‚Äù which has the name of producing the effect.

original: de yang tshogs pa tsam dang rjes su 'brel pa yin te ;
analyzed: de yang tshogs pa tsam dang rjes su 'brel pa yin te ;
translated: And that is related to the mere collection.

original: ji skad bshad pa bzhin no //
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa bzhin no //
translated: As it was explained.

original: tshogs pa yod pa tsam dang rjes su 'brel pa de tshogs pa dag las rjes su dpog pa na rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs yin la /
analyzed: tshogs pa yod pa tsam dang rjes su 'brel pa de tshogs pa dag las rjes su dpog pa na rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs yin la /
translated: When one infers from the mere existence of the collection and the relation, it is an inference based on the nature of the reason.

original: 'brel ba nges pa'i tshul ni ji skad brjod pa bzhin yin pas de bzhin can rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag gi tshul gsum yin no ;
analyzed: 'brel ba nges pa'i tshul ni ji skad brjod pa bzhin yin pas de bzhin can rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag gi tshul gsum yin no ;
translated: The mode of ascertaining the relation is as it was stated, so it is a trimodal relation of positive and negative concomitance.

original: / don gzhan la ni mi ltos phyir //
analyzed: / don gzhan la ni mi ltos phyir //
translated: Because it does not depend on another object.

original: zhes bya ba 'di'i 'grel pa ni 'di yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'di'i 'grel pa ni 'di yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The commentary on this is ‚Äúthis also.‚Äù

original: 'bras bu skye ba 'di yang lan cig byed pa ji ltar nye ba las gzhan la mi ltos te /
analyzed: 'bras bu skye ba 'di yang lan cig byed pa ji ltar nye ba las gzhan la mi ltos te /
translated: This arising of the effect is also not dependent on anything else other than the mere proximity of the cause.

original: des na ngo bo'i zhes bya ba 'di ltar nye ba'i rgyu'i de tsam dang 'brel ba'i rang bzhin yin no //
analyzed: des na ngo bo'i zhes bya ba 'di ltar nye ba'i rgyu'i de tsam dang 'brel ba'i rang bzhin yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is said, ‚Äúthe nature of the effect is such that it is related to the mere proximity of the cause.‚Äù

original: rgyu tshogs pa yis zhes bya ba bshad pa ni /
analyzed: rgyu tshogs pa yis zhes bya ba bshad pa ni /
translated: The explanation of ‚Äúby the assembly of causes‚Äù is as follows.

original: de la ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de la ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIn that‚Äù refers to that.

original: rgyu tshogs pa las zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs te /
analyzed: rgyu tshogs pa las zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs te /
translated: ‚ÄúFrom the assembly of causes‚Äù is the reason.

original: gtan tshigs de'i phyir srid pa rjes su dpog pa yin no //
analyzed: gtan tshigs de'i phyir srid pa rjes su dpog pa yin no //
translated: For that reason, existence is inferred.

original: yang 'di gang gi srid pa rjes su dpog / srid pa zhes bya ba 'di yang ci zhig ce na /
analyzed: yang 'di gang gi srid pa rjes su dpog / srid pa zhes bya ba 'di yang ci zhig ce na /
translated: Moreover, what is inferred here? What is this so-called existence?
