original: gtan tshigs rnams kyi zhes smos so //
analyzed: gtan tshigs rnams kyi zhes smos so //
translated: ‚ÄúOf the reasons‚Äù is stated.

original: gang gi phyir chos can tshogs pa rnams kyi rung ba nyid rjes su dpog pa'i rgyu de'i phyir na rung ba rjes su dpog pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir chos can tshogs pa rnams kyi rung ba nyid rjes su dpog pa'i rgyu de'i phyir na rung ba rjes su dpog pa yin no //
translated: Because the suitability of the assembly of the subject is the cause of inference, therefore suitability is inferred.

original: des na srid pa ni rung ba nyid yin no zhes brjod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na srid pa ni rung ba nyid yin no zhes brjod par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus it is said that existence is suitability.

original: tshogs pa nyid chos can yin te des na sa la sogs pa'i chos can dag la sogs pa nyid la 'bras bu skye bar rung ba nyid rjes su dpog pa yin no //
analyzed: tshogs pa nyid chos can yin te des na sa la sogs pa'i chos can dag la sogs pa nyid la 'bras bu skye bar rung ba nyid rjes su dpog pa yin no //
translated: The collection itself is the subject, and so it is the collection of subjects such as earth, etc., that is inferred to be the proper cause of the effect.

original: de lta yin dang rang bzhin nyid du 'thad pa yin gyi 'bras bu'i chos su gyur pa'i skye ba dpog pa la ni ma yin no zhes smos pa ni rung ba nyid kyang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de lta yin dang rang bzhin nyid du 'thad pa yin gyi 'bras bu'i chos su gyur pa'i skye ba dpog pa la ni ma yin no zhes smos pa ni rung ba nyid kyang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If that were so, it would be tenable as the intrinsic nature, but not as the effect-phenomenon that is the inference of arising.

original: rang bzhin du gyur pa kho na'o zhes bya ba ni tshogs pa'i zhes bya ba la ltos pa ste tha mi dad pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rang bzhin du gyur pa kho na'o zhes bya ba ni tshogs pa'i zhes bya ba la ltos pa ste tha mi dad pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúthe proper cause‚Äù means that it is the intrinsic nature alone that is the collection.üîΩThe phrase ‚Äúit is not different‚Äù means that it is not different from the collection.

original: nus pa nus pa can las don gzhan ma yin yang de grub kyang ma grub pas gos dang tshon bzhin du rang bzhin ma yin par 'gyur na /
analyzed: nus pa nus pa can las don gzhan ma yin yang de grub kyang ma grub pas gos dang tshon bzhin du rang bzhin ma yin par 'gyur na /
translated: Although the capacity is not a different object from the capable one, it is not the intrinsic nature, like cloth and dye, because it is not established even when the other is established.

original: de ni med do zhes bshad pa ni /
analyzed: de ni med do zhes bshad pa ni /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúthat does not exist‚Äù explains that.

original: tshogs pa tsam dang rjes su 'brel pa yin pas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: tshogs pa tsam dang rjes su 'brel pa yin pas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúbecause it is related to the mere collection‚Äù means that it is related to the mere collection.

original: 'di dag ji srid tshogs pas thob pa de @54a * //
analyzed: 'di dag ji srid tshogs pas thob pa de @54a * //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúas long as the collection is obtained‚Äù means that it is obtained as long as the collection exists.

original: srid du 'bras bu skye ba dang mthun pa bogs 'byung bas na khyad par skyed pa yin no //
analyzed: srid du 'bras bu skye ba dang mthun pa bogs 'byung bas na khyad par skyed pa yin no //
translated: and in length, it is conducive to the arising of the effect, and so it is a special cause.

original: des na tha mi dad pa'i phyir dang / phyis 'byung ba ma yin pa'i phyir rang bzhin nyid du rigs so //
analyzed: des na tha mi dad pa'i phyir dang / phyis 'byung ba ma yin pa'i phyir rang bzhin nyid du rigs so //
translated: Therefore, it is reasonable that it is the intrinsic nature, because it is not different and because it does not arise later.

original: 'o na rung ba nyid rjes su dpog pa la rang bzhin nyid yin mod /üîΩgang gis gtan tshigs gzhan du 'gyur ba 'bras bu skyed pa nyid go ci ste rjes su mi dpogs zhes smras pa ni /
analyzed: 'o na rung ba nyid rjes su dpog pa la rang bzhin nyid yin mod / gang gis gtan tshigs gzhan du 'gyur ba 'bras bu skyed pa nyid go ci ste rjes su mi dpogs zhes smras pa ni /
translated: Well, it is reasonable that it is the intrinsic nature in the inference of suitability.üîΩBut why is it not inferred that the cause itself is the effect-producer?üîΩThis is what is said.

original: yang ci'i phyir zhes bya ba yin no //üîΩtshogs pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni lan 'debs so //
analyzed: yang ci'i phyir zhes bya ba yin no // tshogs pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni lan 'debs so //
translated: Why is it not inferred?üîΩThe response is with ‚ÄúThe effect is not the cause of the assemblage,‚Äù and so on.üîΩThe effect is not the cause of the assemblage, because the effect is not the cause of the assemblage.üîΩThe effect is not the cause of the assemblage, because the effect is not the cause of the assemblage.

original: 'bras bu yul can du gyur pa las tshogs pa'i gtan tshigs ma nges pa nyid yin no zhes bsgyur nas 'brel to //
analyzed: 'bras bu yul can du gyur pa las tshogs pa'i gtan tshigs ma nges pa nyid yin no zhes bsgyur nas 'brel to //
translated: The effect is not the cause of the assemblage, because the effect is not the cause of the assemblage.üîΩThe effect is not the cause of the assemblage, because the effect is not the cause of the assemblage.üîΩThe effect is not the cause of the assemblage, because the effect is not the cause of the assemblage.üîΩThe effect is not the cause of the assemblage, because the effect is not the cause of the assemblage.üîΩThe effect is not the cause of the assemblage, because the effect is not the cause of the assemblage.üîΩThe effect is not the cause of the assemblage, because the effect is not the cause of the assemblage.üîΩThe effect is not the cause of the assemblage, because the effect is not the cause of the assemblage.üîΩThe effect is not the cause of the assemblage, because the effect is not the cause of the assemblage.üîΩThe effect is not the cause of the assemblage, because the effect is not the cause of the assemblage.üîΩThe effect is not the cause of the assemblage, because the effect is not the cause of the assemblage.üîΩThe effect is not the cause of the assemblage, because the effect is not the cause of the assemblage.üîΩThe effect is not the cause of the assemblage, because the effect is not the cause of the assemblage.üîΩThe effect is not the cause of the assemblage, because the effect is not the cause of the assemblage.üîΩThe effect is not the cause of the assemblage, because the effect is not the cause of the assemblage.üîΩThe effect is not the cause of the assemblage, because the effect is not the cause of the assemblage.

original: ma nges pa nyid kyi rgyu bstan pa'i phyir 'bras bu khyad par du byed de /
analyzed: ma nges pa nyid kyi rgyu bstan pa'i phyir 'bras bu khyad par du byed de /
translated: The effect is not the cause of the assemblage, because the effect is not the cause of the assemblage

original: myu gu la sogs pa bskyed par bya ba ni 'bras bu yin la de la dang 'bras bu skyed par byed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi nus pa ni 'bras bu la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: myu gu la sogs pa bskyed par bya ba ni 'bras bu yin la de la dang 'bras bu skyed par byed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi nus pa ni 'bras bu la gnas pa'o //
translated: The effect that is to be produced, such as a sprout, is the effect that is present in the cause, because the cause has the capacity that has the characteristic of producing the effect.

original: tshogs pa de ni de nyid kyi yin te /
analyzed: tshogs pa de ni de nyid kyi yin te /
translated: The collection is that of just that,

original: de nyid skyed par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid skyed par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because just that is the producer.

original: de rnams 'gyur ba ni ji skad brjod pa'i bogs 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: de rnams 'gyur ba ni ji skad brjod pa'i bogs 'byung ba ste /
translated: The transformation of those is the arising of the enhancement that has been described,

original: de dang 'brel pa'i 'bras bu la'o //
analyzed: de dang 'brel pa'i 'bras bu la'o //
translated: in the effect that is related to that.

original: gang gi phyir phyi ma phyi mar khyad par thob pa nyid kyi tshogs pa las 'bras bu skye ba de'i phyir 'di la tshogs pa rnams ma nges pa nyid de /
analyzed: gang gi phyir phyi ma phyi mar khyad par thob pa nyid kyi tshogs pa las 'bras bu skye ba de'i phyir 'di la tshogs pa rnams ma nges pa nyid de /
translated: Because the effect arises from the collection that has attained a special state in each subsequent moment, therefore, the collection is uncertain in this regard,

original: de yod kyang 'bras bu 'byung bar 'gyur ba las 'da' bas gtan med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yod kyang 'bras bu 'byung bar 'gyur ba las 'da' bas gtan med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because even when it exists, the effect does not arise, and it is not completely nonexistent.

original: gang gi phyir 'gyur ba ltos na ma nges pa nyid bshad pa ni /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'gyur ba ltos na ma nges pa nyid bshad pa ni /
translated: The uncertainty that is explained in dependence on transformation is

original: gags byed pa dag ces bya ba yin no //
analyzed: gags byed pa dag ces bya ba yin no //
translated: the obstruction.

original: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being said:

original: gang gi phyir gang gis skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin skyed par nges pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir gang gis skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin skyed par nges pa'i phyir /
translated: Because of the certainty of the production of the nature of the producer,

original: de nyid 'bras bu 'byung bar 'gyur ba nyid las mi 'da' bar 'gyur ba tshogs pa rnams nye ba tsam nyid las 'bras bu skye ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de nyid 'bras bu 'byung bar 'gyur ba nyid las mi 'da' bar 'gyur ba tshogs pa rnams nye ba tsam nyid las 'bras bu skye ba ma yin gyi /
translated: the effect will not fail to arise from that very thing. The effect is not produced merely from the presence of the assemblage.

original: 'on kyang phan tshun phul du byung ba'i khyad par bskyed pas chod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang phan tshun phul du byung ba'i khyad par bskyed pas chod pa yin no //
translated: However, it is produced from the presence of the assemblage that has generated a special excellence.

original: des na tshogs pa de tsam nyid nye bar gnas pa las phyi ma phyi ma khyad par dang bcas pa skyed pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: des na tshogs pa de tsam nyid nye bar gnas pa las phyi ma phyi ma khyad par dang bcas pa skyed pa de bzhin du /
translated: Therefore, the subsequent effect is produced from the presence of just that assemblage, together with a special quality.

original: de nyid du dngos po gzhan nye bar gnas pa las de'i nus pa skye ba dang mi mthun pa'i phyir de mi skye bar yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid du dngos po gzhan nye bar gnas pa las de'i nus pa skye ba dang mi mthun pa'i phyir de mi skye bar yang 'gyur ro //
translated: In the same way, the effect will not be produced from the presence of just that assemblage, because the capacity for the production of the effect is not compatible with the presence of another thing.

original: de bas na 'gyur ba la ltos pa'i phyir gags byed pa srid pa yin no //
analyzed: de bas na 'gyur ba la ltos pa'i phyir gags byed pa srid pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, because it depends on a change, it is possible for an obstruction to occur.

original: rgyu'i rdzas zhes bya ba ni 'grel pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu'i rdzas zhes bya ba ni 'grel pa'o //
translated: The commentary says, ‚Äúthe substance of the cause.‚Äù

original: 'dis ni nges pa nyid brjod do //
analyzed: 'dis ni nges pa nyid brjod do //
translated: This expresses certainty.

original: kho na'i sgra ni nges par gzung ba yin te /
analyzed: kho na'i sgra ni nges par gzung ba yin te /
translated: The word ‚Äúonly‚Äù is for the purpose of exclusion.

original: kho nas zhes bya bas ni @54b gtan tshigs 'phen pa yin te /üîΩdes na tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs de tsam kho na'i phyir ni rgyu rnams 'bras bu skyed par byed pa ma yin no zhes brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: kho nas zhes bya bas ni @54b gtan tshigs 'phen pa yin te / des na tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs de tsam kho na'i phyir ni rgyu rnams 'bras bu skyed par byed pa ma yin no zhes brjod pa yin no //
translated: The word ‚Äúonly‚Äù indicates the reason.üîΩTherefore, the reason ‚Äúbecause of the mere collection‚Äù is not a reason for the production of effects by causes.

original: des na de dag yod pas 'bras bu 'byung bar ma nges pa'i phyir 'bras bu mi skye yang de yod pas tshogs pa nyid 'bras bu skye ba la ma nges pa nyid do //
analyzed: des na de dag yod pas 'bras bu 'byung bar ma nges pa'i phyir 'bras bu mi skye yang de yod pas tshogs pa nyid 'bras bu skye ba la ma nges pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, since the effect does not definitely arise from the mere existence of the conditions, the effect does not arise. But since the effect does not arise, the mere collection of conditions is not a reason for the production of the effect.

original: ji ltar skyed par byed pa ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar skyed par byed pa ma yin zhe na /
translated: How is it not a reason?

original: 'bras bu dang 'brel pa'i skye ba gang yin pa de ni tshogs pa las skye ba can gyi nus pa gang yin pa de rnams kyi 'gyur ba la ltos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu dang 'brel pa'i skye ba gang yin pa de ni tshogs pa las skye ba can gyi nus pa gang yin pa de rnams kyi 'gyur ba la ltos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the arising of the effect that is related to the effect is dependent on the transformation of those potencies that arise from the mere collection.

original: de de tsam las ni 'byung ba ma yin no snyam du bsams pa'o //
analyzed: de de tsam las ni 'byung ba ma yin no snyam du bsams pa'o //
translated: It is not the case that the effect arises from the mere collection.

original: bar 'dir te tshogs pa nya ba dang 'bras bu skye ba'i dbus yongs su 'gyur ba'i ming can 'dir gags byed pa srid pa'i phyir mi skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bar 'dir te tshogs pa nya ba dang 'bras bu skye ba'i dbus yongs su 'gyur ba'i ming can 'dir gags byed pa srid pa'i phyir mi skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In the middle, i.e., between the cause and the effect, there is the so-called transformation, which is possible to obstruct, and therefore the effect does not arise.

original: de'i phyir tshogs pa dag kho nas rang gi 'bras bu skye bar byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir tshogs pa dag kho nas rang gi 'bras bu skye bar byed pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the collection itself does not produce its own effect.

original: de bas na 'bras bu rjes su dpag pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na 'bras bu rjes su dpag pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the effect is not inferred.

original: rung ba nyid rjes su dpog na ni de ltar ma nges pa nyid ma yin no zhes bshad pa ni /
analyzed: rung ba nyid rjes su dpog na ni de ltar ma nges pa nyid ma yin no zhes bshad pa ni /
translated: If suitability is inferred, it is not so uncertain. This is explained:

original: rung ba nyid ni zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: rung ba nyid ni zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: Suitability is...

original: 'bras bu yang rdzas gzhan la mi ltos pa ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: 'bras bu yang rdzas gzhan la mi ltos pa ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: Isn't the effect also not dependent on another substance?

original: bden mod kyi 'di ltar bsams pa yin te ji ltar 'bras bu'i rgyu'i rdzas yongs su rdzogs pa yin yang 'gyur ba la ltos pas par chod par 'gyur ba'i phyir gags byed pa'i rgyu 'jug pa de bzhin du gang gis bar chod srid pas gags byed par 'jug
analyzed: bden mod kyi 'di ltar bsams pa yin te ji ltar 'bras bu'i rgyu'i rdzas yongs su rdzogs pa yin yang 'gyur ba la ltos pas par chod par 'gyur ba'i phyir gags byed pa'i rgyu 'jug pa de bzhin du gang gis bar chod srid pas gags byed par 'jug
translated: It is true, but it is thought like this: Just as the substance of the cause of the effect is complete, but because it depends on transformation, it becomes obstructed, and the obstructing cause engages, in the same way, by what obstruction is possible, the obstructing cause engages.

original: par 'gyur ba /üîΩ'gyur pa yang 'gyur pa la ltos pa dge las skye ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: par 'gyur ba / 'gyur pa yang 'gyur pa la ltos pa dge las skye ba ni ma yin te /
translated: and the transformation of the transformation.

original: tshogs pa rnams 'gyur ba la mi sdod par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshogs pa rnams 'gyur ba la mi sdod par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The transformation of the transformation does not arise from the transformation, because the collection of causes of the transformation does not remain in the transformation.

original: de lta ma yin na rdzas gzhan la ltos par thar ba'i phyir ro //üîΩ'di dag gi 'bras bu na skyed pa'i tshogs pa ni 'di nyid yin te /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na rdzas gzhan la ltos par thar ba'i phyir ro // 'di dag gi 'bras bu na skyed pa'i tshogs pa ni 'di nyid yin te /
translated: Otherwise, it would be dependent on another substance.üîΩThe collection of causes of the effect is just this,

original: tshogs pa tsam nyid na 'bras bu dang mthun pa'i khyad par sgrub pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: tshogs pa tsam nyid na 'bras bu dang mthun pa'i khyad par sgrub pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: because it is the cause of the production of the effect.

original: de tsam 'brel pa tsam nyid las skyed par byed pa ma yin na khyad par med pa'i phyir phyis kyang skyed par byed par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de tsam 'brel pa tsam nyid las skyed par byed pa ma yin na khyad par med pa'i phyir phyis kyang skyed par byed par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If it were not the cause of the effect merely by its mere presence, then later it would not be the cause of the effect, because it would be without difference.

original: lhan cig byed pa la ltos na ni de ltar 'gyur te /
analyzed: lhan cig byed pa la ltos na ni de ltar 'gyur te /
translated: But if it is dependent on the cooperating causes, then it is the cause of the effect.

original: de'i ltos par bya ba ma tshang ba'i phyir de khyad par rtsom pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i ltos par bya ba ma tshang ba'i phyir de khyad par rtsom pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the cooperating causes are incomplete, it does not begin to produce the effect.

original: der yang 'brel pa tsam nyid las khyad par skye bar brjod par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: der yang 'brel pa tsam nyid las khyad par skye bar brjod par bya ba yin te /
translated: But even then, the production of the effect should be said to occur merely by the presence of the cooperating causes.

original: de lta ma yin na thal ba de nyid du 'gyur ro //üîΩde'i @55a * //üîΩphyir tshogs pa rnams rdzas gzhan la mi ltos pa kho nar rung ba skyed pa na /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na thal ba de nyid du 'gyur ro // de'i @55a * // phyir tshogs pa rnams rdzas gzhan la mi ltos pa kho nar rung ba skyed pa na /
translated: If it were not so, then the absurd consequence would follow that the effect would be produced even when the assemblage is not present.

original: ltos pa dang bcas pas de byed pa nyid du grub bo //
analyzed: ltos pa dang bcas pas de byed pa nyid du grub bo //
translated: Therefore, when the assemblage, which is capable of producing the effect without depending on any other substance, produces the effect, it is established as the cause of that effect.

original: de nyid kyi phyir rung ba nyid du rjes su dpog pa la tshogs pa rnams mi 'khrul pa yin te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rung ba nyid du rjes su dpog pa la tshogs pa rnams mi 'khrul pa yin te /
translated: For this very reason, the assemblage is non-erroneous in the inference of capability.

original: rgyu nus pa 'bras bu la 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir ro ;
analyzed: rgyu nus pa 'bras bu la 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir ro ;
translated: This is because the power of the cause is not erroneous with regard to the effect.

original: / tshogs pa rnams rung ba nyid skyed pa la ni 'brel pa tsam nyid las nus pa yin no //
analyzed: / tshogs pa rnams rung ba nyid skyed pa la ni 'brel pa tsam nyid las nus pa yin no //
translated: The assemblage has the power to produce capability merely through its mere connection.

original: nus pa de rtogs pa ni dang po 'brel pa nyid med na phyis kyang med par thal ba'i phyir dang / khyad par skye ba la mi ltos na chod nas byed pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nus pa de rtogs pa ni dang po 'brel pa nyid med na phyis kyang med par thal ba'i phyir dang / khyad par skye ba la mi ltos na chod nas byed pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The understanding of that power is not possible if there is no connection in the beginning, because it would follow that there would be no connection later on, and because it is not possible for the power to act at a distance without depending on the arising of a special quality.

original: 'bras bu skye ba la ni chod pa med pa tha ma'i gnas skabs thob par nges par mi nus so zhes rnam par nges par bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: 'bras bu skye ba la ni chod pa med pa tha ma'i gnas skabs thob par nges par mi nus so zhes rnam par nges par bshad pa yin no //
translated: But it is not certain that the effect will definitely obtain the final state without interruption.

original: 'o na 'di nyid du rgyu'i tshogs pa snga ma las phyi ma khyad par can du rung ba nyid dang ldan pa rjes su dpag par bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'o na 'di nyid du rgyu'i tshogs pa snga ma las phyi ma khyad par can du rung ba nyid dang ldan pa rjes su dpag par bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Well then, it would be inferred that the later cause-assemblies are endowed with the capacity for the later effects.

original: des na rgyu las 'bras bu 'grub po zhe na /üîΩde ni med de nus pa ni 'brel pa tsam la brten nas ji skad bshad pa'i rigs pa nyid kyis rtogs pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: des na rgyu las 'bras bu 'grub po zhe na / de ni med de nus pa ni 'brel pa tsam la brten nas ji skad bshad pa'i rigs pa nyid kyis rtogs pa'i phyir te /
translated: Therefore, the effect is established from the cause.

original: mngon sum las ni ma yin no //
analyzed: mngon sum las ni ma yin no //
translated: That is not so, because the capacity is understood by the reasoning explained above, which is based on mere connection, and not by direct perception.

original: 'o na rigs pas rtogs pa'i nus pa dang ldan pa las rjes su dpog par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na rigs pas rtogs pa'i nus pa dang ldan pa las rjes su dpog par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: Well then, it would be inferred from that which is endowed with the capacity that is understood by reasoning.

original: gal te tshogs pa'i skad cig snga ma rnams phyi ma'i skad cig las tha dad pa'i rang bzhin du rtogs pa'i phyir yin na 'gyur ba yin no /
analyzed: gal te tshogs pa'i skad cig snga ma rnams phyi ma'i skad cig las tha dad pa'i rang bzhin du rtogs pa'i phyir yin na 'gyur ba yin no /
translated: If it is because the former moments of the assembly are understood to be a different nature from the later moments, then it would be so.

original: de lta na ni ma yin te skad cig gi dbye ba mi rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta na ni ma yin te skad cig gi dbye ba mi rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: But this is not so, because the divisions of the moment are not understood.

original: de'i phyir dang po 'brel pa nas brtsams te /
analyzed: de'i phyir dang po 'brel pa nas brtsams te /
translated: Therefore, beginning with the connection,

original: skad cig thams cad nus pa dang nus pa skyed par byed pa zhes bya bar gnas pas de dag gi rang bzhin de nyid tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid 'brel pa las rjes su dpog pa yin no //
analyzed: skad cig thams cad nus pa dang nus pa skyed par byed pa zhes bya bar gnas pas de dag gi rang bzhin de nyid tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid 'brel pa las rjes su dpog pa yin no //
translated: all moments are called ‚Äúcapable‚Äù and ‚Äúproducing capability.‚Äù Their nature is inferred from the connection characterized by the collection.

original: de dag tsam nye bar gyur ba'i tshogs pa nyid ni 'brel par brjod do //
analyzed: de dag tsam nye bar gyur ba'i tshogs pa nyid ni 'brel par brjod do //
translated: That mere collection that has come together is called ‚Äúconnected.‚Äù

original: rung ba nyid de ji ltar rjes su dpog ce na /
analyzed: rung ba nyid de ji ltar rjes su dpog ce na /
translated: How is that capability inferred?

original: bshad pa 'di zhes bya ba ni chos can no //
analyzed: bshad pa 'di zhes bya ba ni chos can no //
translated: This is the subject.

original: tshogs pa zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs so //
analyzed: tshogs pa zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs so //
translated: The collection is the reason.

original: nus pa phyi ma phyi ma 'gyur bas 'bras bu skyed par nus pa yin te zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: nus pa phyi ma phyi ma 'gyur bas 'bras bu skyed par nus pa yin te zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: The conclusion is that it is capable of producing the effect because of the transformation of the subsequent capability.

original: nus pa 'gyur ba'i rkyen gzhan la ltos pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni khyab par nges pa'o //
analyzed: nus pa 'gyur ba'i rkyen gzhan la ltos pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni khyab par nges pa'o //
translated: The pervasion is ascertained by ‚Äúbecause it does not depend on other conditions for the transformation of capability.‚Äù

original: de ltar gtan tshigs ston pa yang mthong ste /
analyzed: de ltar gtan tshigs ston pa yang mthong ste /
translated: Thus, the demonstration of the reason is seen.

original: dper na byas pa 'di ni mi rtag pa yin te /
analyzed: dper na byas pa 'di ni mi rtag pa yin te /
translated: For example, it is like saying, ‚ÄúThis produced thing is impermanent

original: 'jig pa'i rgyu gzhan la mi ltos pa'i phyir ro @55b zhes bya ba bzhin no //
analyzed: 'jig pa'i rgyu gzhan la mi ltos pa'i phyir ro @55b zhes bya ba bzhin no //
translated: because it does not depend on another cause for destruction.‚ÄùüîΩSince there is no other condition that is a transformation of potentiality that is to be relied upon, it is explained that there is no reliance on the arising of a subsequent particular.

original: nus pa 'gyur pa'i rkyen la ltos par bya ba gzhan med pas khyad par phyi ma skyes pa la ltos pa med par bshad pa ni nus pa 'gyur ba'i rkyen gzhan la ltos par bya ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nus pa 'gyur pa'i rkyen la ltos par bya ba gzhan med pas khyad par phyi ma skyes pa la ltos pa med par bshad pa ni nus pa 'gyur ba'i rkyen gzhan la ltos par bya ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Since there is no other condition that is a transformation of potentiality that is to be relied upon, it is explained that there is no reliance on the arising of a subsequent particular.

original: de nyid ji ltar zhe na nus pa skye na ni rigs snga ma tsam gyi rgyu can yin pa'i phyir ro zhes smos so //
analyzed: de nyid ji ltar zhe na nus pa skye na ni rigs snga ma tsam gyi rgyu can yin pa'i phyir ro zhes smos so //
translated: How is that? When potentiality arises, it is due to the mere cause of the prior type.

original: rigs mthun pa'i skad cig snga ma tsam las ltos pa'i tshogs pa las rung ba nyid skye ba'i phyir ltos pa med pa nyid yin ne //
analyzed: rigs mthun pa'i skad cig snga ma tsam las ltos pa'i tshogs pa las rung ba nyid skye ba'i phyir ltos pa med pa nyid yin ne //
translated: Since the suitability of reliance arises from the mere prior moment of a homogeneous type, there is no reliance.

original: rjes su dpog pa gzhan yang rnam pa gsum nyid kyi khongs su bsdu ba'i phyir 'o na zhes rtsod par byed do //
analyzed: rjes su dpog pa gzhan yang rnam pa gsum nyid kyi khongs su bsdu ba'i phyir 'o na zhes rtsod par byed do //
translated: Since inference is also included within the three types, the opponent argues, ‚ÄúWell then‚Ä¶‚Äù

original: rgyu dang 'bras bur ma gyur pa zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu'i rjes su dpog pa dang rung ba nyid rjes su dpog pa las phyi rol du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bur ma gyur pa zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu'i rjes su dpog pa dang rung ba nyid rjes su dpog pa las phyi rol du gyur pa'o //
translated: That which is neither a cause nor an effect is that which is external to the inference of an effect and the inference of capability.

original: gzhan zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs las tha dad pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs las tha dad pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOther‚Äù means different from a natural inference.

original: ro la sogs pas gzugs la sogs pa rtogs pa gang yin pa de ji ltar te /
analyzed: ro la sogs pas gzugs la sogs pa rtogs pa gang yin pa de ji ltar te /
translated: How is it that form, etc. is understood through taste, etc.?

original: rnam pa gang gis yin /
analyzed: rnam pa gang gis yin /
translated: In what way?

original: ji ltar bstan pa ltar ni mi srid do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ji ltar bstan pa ltar ni mi srid do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is impossible in the way it is taught‚Äîthis is the meaning.

original: mun khung du mig gis byed pa med par ro'i khyad par myong ba las ma du lung ga la sogs pa la gnas pa'i gzugs rtogs pa 'am /
analyzed: mun khung du mig gis byed pa med par ro'i khyad par myong ba las ma du lung ga la sogs pa la gnas pa'i gzugs rtogs pa 'am /
translated: In a dark house, without the operation of the eye, form located in molasses, etc. is understood through the experience of a particular taste.

original: yang na ro la gnas pa'i khyad par rtogs pas 'bras bu dag la smin pa dang ma smin pa la sogs pa rtogs pa na de'i gnas skabs na nges pa'i gzugs rtogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: yang na ro la gnas pa'i khyad par rtogs pas 'bras bu dag la smin pa dang ma smin pa la sogs pa rtogs pa na de'i gnas skabs na nges pa'i gzugs rtogs pa bzhin no //
translated: Or, through the understanding of a particular located in taste, when ripened and unripened, etc. is understood in fruits, form located there is understood, as in the case of a particular located in a condition.

original: yang de ji ltar zhes bya ba gtan tshigs rnam pa gsum / gyi nang du 'du zhes bya bar 'brel to //
analyzed: yang de ji ltar zhes bya ba gtan tshigs rnam pa gsum / gyi nang du 'du zhes bya bar 'brel to //
translated: Also, how is that included within the three types of reason? The phrase is included connects this to the question.

original: 'di la lan 'debs pa ni de yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di la lan 'debs pa ni de yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response to this is That is also....

original: rtsod par byed pas ro la sogs pas gzugs la sogs pa rtogs par smras pa'i gzugs la sogs pa rtogs pa de yang zhes bya ba rjes su brjod nas tshogs pa gcig la zhes rang gi ngo bo ston par byed do //
analyzed: rtsod par byed pas ro la sogs pas gzugs la sogs pa rtogs par smras pa'i gzugs la sogs pa rtogs pa de yang zhes bya ba rjes su brjod nas tshogs pa gcig la zhes rang gi ngo bo ston par byed do //
translated: The opponent has said that form, etc. is understood through taste, etc. The phrase that understanding of form, etc. restates that. The phrase in a single collection indicates the nature of the reason.

original: gzugs la sogs pa'i bsgrub par bya ba ro la sogs pa'i gtan tshigs las rtogs pa ni tshogs pa gcig la rag las pa yin no //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa'i bsgrub par bya ba ro la sogs pa'i gtan tshigs las rtogs pa ni tshogs pa gcig la rag las pa yin no //
translated: The understanding of the probandum, form, etc. from the reason, taste, etc. is dependent on a single collection.

original: 'dis ni der mi 'khrul pa brjod do //
analyzed: 'dis ni der mi 'khrul pa brjod do //
translated: This indicates that the reason is non-deviating.

original: de med par gzhan gyis gzhan rtogs par mi rung ba'i phyir dang / nges par brtags pa 'di nyid 'dir 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de med par gzhan gyis gzhan rtogs par mi rung ba'i phyir dang / nges par brtags pa 'di nyid 'dir 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not possible for one thing to understand another without that, and because this very ascertainment is tenable here.

original: rgyu gang las ro skyes pa de nyid las gzugs skye ba'o //
analyzed: rgyu gang las ro skyes pa de nyid las gzugs skye ba'o //
translated: Form arises from that very cause from which taste arises.

original: des na ji ltar 'di'i rgyu gzhan las @56a * //
analyzed: des na ji ltar 'di'i rgyu gzhan las @56a * //
translated: Therefore, how could its cause be different from it?

original: mi 'byung ba'i phyir ldog pa nges pa de bzhin du rang gi rgyu las gdon mi za bar de 'byung ba'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba yang nges pa yin no //
analyzed: mi 'byung ba'i phyir ldog pa nges pa de bzhin du rang gi rgyu las gdon mi za bar de 'byung ba'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba yang nges pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, just as it is ascertained that the effect does not arise from another cause, in the same way, it is ascertained that it definitely arises from its own cause, because it arises from its own cause without fail.

original: des na ji ltar ro'i rgyu de de skyed bar nus pa'i phyir ro //üîΩ'byung ba de bzhin ro'i rgyu nyid gzugs kyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir de gzugs skyed par yang nus pa kho na'o //
analyzed: des na ji ltar ro'i rgyu de de skyed bar nus pa'i phyir ro // 'byung ba de bzhin ro'i rgyu nyid gzugs kyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir de gzugs skyed par yang nus pa kho na'o //
translated: Therefore, just as the cause of taste is able to produce taste,üîΩbecause the cause of taste is also the cause of form, it is able to produce form.

original: des na de las gzugs 'byung bar yang nges pa nyid pas ro yod na gzugs yod par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des na de las gzugs 'byung bar yang nges pa nyid pas ro yod na gzugs yod par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, it is ascertained that form arises from that cause, and when taste exists, form exists.

original: gzugs dang ro dag med na ni mi 'byung bar grub bo //
analyzed: gzugs dang ro dag med na ni mi 'byung bar grub bo //
translated: It is established that form and taste do not arise when they are absent.

original: tshul 'dis med na mi 'byung ba yin du chug mod /
analyzed: tshul 'dis med na mi 'byung ba yin du chug mod /
translated: By this method, it is allowed that they are not produced when absent.

original: ro las gzugs rjes su dpog pa na de de la 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs ni ma yin te lhan cig 'byung bas de'i 'bras bu de ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ro las gzugs rjes su dpog pa na de de la 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs ni ma yin te lhan cig 'byung bas de'i 'bras bu de ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: When form is inferred from taste, it is not a reason of effect in that, because they are co-existent, it is not the effect of that.

original: rang bzhin yang ma yin te /
analyzed: rang bzhin yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is it the nature of the effect,

original: tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is different from it.

original: des na 'di dag gi med na mi 'byung ba'i bsgrub pa'i 'brel pa gsum par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na 'di dag gi med na mi 'byung ba'i bsgrub pa'i 'brel pa gsum par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the relation of the effect to its cause is a third kind of relation, that of invariable concomitance.

original: gal te rang gi rgyu nyid dang 'brel pa de gnyis de med na mi 'byung ba'i phyir shugs kyis lhan cig 'byung bar nges par yang rtogs pa na rtogs pa po gcig las gzhan rjes su dpog go zhe na /
analyzed: gal te rang gi rgyu nyid dang 'brel pa de gnyis de med na mi 'byung ba'i phyir shugs kyis lhan cig 'byung bar nges par yang rtogs pa na rtogs pa po gcig las gzhan rjes su dpog go zhe na /
translated: If the relation of the effect to its cause is the relation of the effect to its material cause, then, because the two are invariably concomitant, one who understands the one infers the other.

original: de lta yin du zad mod /
analyzed: de lta yin du zad mod /
translated: This is certainly so.

original: 'on kyang gtan tshigs 'di 'bras bu ma yin zhing rang bzhin yang ma yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'on kyang gtan tshigs 'di 'bras bu ma yin zhing rang bzhin yang ma yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: But still, this reason is neither an effect nor the nature of the object.

original: dogs pa 'di bsu nas /
analyzed: dogs pa 'di bsu nas /
translated: In response to this doubt,

original: de lta yin dang yang 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs las ji ltar ma 'das pa de ston pa ni rgyu chos rjes su dpag pa ste zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de lta yin dang yang 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs las ji ltar ma 'das pa de ston pa ni rgyu chos rjes su dpag pa ste zhes bya ba'o //
translated: the text says, ‚ÄúThe inference of the effect is from the cause.‚Äù

original: don 'di yin te /
analyzed: don 'di yin te /
translated: This is the meaning.

original: gang gis de rjes su dpog pa na gtan tshigs 'di gang yin zhes bsam pa 'dir ro las gzugs chod pa med par dngos su dpog pa ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gang gis de rjes su dpog pa na gtan tshigs 'di gang yin zhes bsam pa 'dir ro las gzugs chod pa med par dngos su dpog pa ni ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not that the form is directly inferred from the taste, but

original: 'o na kyang ros ni rang gi rgyu'i chos byed pa gzugs skyed pa'i nus pa'i gegs byar med pa nyid ces bya ba gzugs kyi rgyu'i mtshan nyid rjes su dpog par byed do //
analyzed: 'o na kyang ros ni rang gi rgyu'i chos byed pa gzugs skyed pa'i nus pa'i gegs byar med pa nyid ces bya ba gzugs kyi rgyu'i mtshan nyid rjes su dpog par byed do //
translated: the taste infers the characteristic of the cause of the form, which is the absence of an obstruction to the potency of the cause of the form to generate form.

original: de skyed pa'i nus pa gags byar med pa can gyi rgyu yin na ro dang dus mtshungs par 'gyur ba gzugs yod pa nyid du rtogs par 'gyur ba yin no ;
analyzed: de skyed pa'i nus pa gags byar med pa can gyi rgyu yin na ro dang dus mtshungs par 'gyur ba gzugs yod pa nyid du rtogs par 'gyur ba yin no ;
translated: If it is a cause that has the potency to generate that form without obstruction, then the existence of the form that is simultaneous with the taste is understood.

original: / des na ji ltar ro yod pa na gzugs yod pa de lta bu nyid du ma rtogs na de las de ltar rtogs pa mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: / des na ji ltar ro yod pa na gzugs yod pa de lta bu nyid du ma rtogs na de las de ltar rtogs pa mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, if the existence of the form is not understood in the same way that the existence of the taste is understood, then it would not be understood in that way from that.

original: de ltar rtogs na ni 'di 'bras bu nyid las rgyu rtogs pa phyogs gcig tu rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar rtogs na ni 'di 'bras bu nyid las rgyu rtogs pa phyogs gcig tu rtogs pa yin no //
translated: If it is understood in that way, then the cause is understood from the effect, and it is understood in part.

original: 'dir rtogs pa dang 'brel pa gnyi ga yang dper na du bas bud shing 'gyur ba bzhin @56b zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'dir rtogs pa dang 'brel pa gnyi ga yang dper na du bas bud shing 'gyur ba bzhin @56b zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Here, both the connection with the realization and the example are ‚Äúlike smoke with the transformation of fuel.‚Äù

original: du ba la bud shing gyi 'gyur ba bzhin du tshogs pa gcig la rag las pas rgyu'i chos rjes su dpag pas rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: du ba la bud shing gyi 'gyur ba bzhin du tshogs pa gcig la rag las pas rgyu'i chos rjes su dpag pas rtogs pa yin no //
translated: The cause is realized through inference, since it is dependent on the same assemblage as smoke, like the transformation of fuel.

original: 'grel pa ni /
analyzed: 'grel pa ni /
translated: The commentary:

original: de la ni zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de la ni zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúThere‚Äù refers to the cause.

original: rgyu de lta bu kho na zhes bya bas ni rgyu'i chos rjes su dpag par brjod do //üîΩde ji lta bur gyur pa de ston pas tshogs pa gcig la rag las pa nyid 'chad pa ni nus pa zhugs pa gegs byar med pa gang la yod pa ste /
analyzed: rgyu de lta bu kho na zhes bya bas ni rgyu'i chos rjes su dpag par brjod do // de ji lta bur gyur pa de ston pas tshogs pa gcig la rag las pa nyid 'chad pa ni nus pa zhugs pa gegs byar med pa gang la yod pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúJust that kind of cause‚Äù indicates the cause is expressed through inference.

original: de lta bur gyur pa gzugs kyi nye bar len pa'i rgyu'o //
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa gzugs kyi nye bar len pa'i rgyu'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to the cause of form.üîΩ‚ÄúThat which has the capacity to produce it‚Äù indicates the cause of form is dependent on the same assemblage.üîΩ‚ÄúThat which has the capacity to produce it, which is unobstructed‚Äù indicates the cause of form.

original: gzugs kyi skad cig gang las gzugs kyi skad cig phyi ma lhan cig byed pa nye bas bsgrub pa'i khyad par can du skye ba de ni nye bar len pa yin no //
analyzed: gzugs kyi skad cig gang las gzugs kyi skad cig phyi ma lhan cig byed pa nye bas bsgrub pa'i khyad par can du skye ba de ni nye bar len pa yin no //
translated: The cause of form is the immediately preceding condition of form.üîΩThe cause of form is the immediately preceding condition of form.

original: ro'i rgyu ni gzugs kyi nye bar len pa'i rgyu de'i lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen yin te /
analyzed: ro'i rgyu ni gzugs kyi nye bar len pa'i rgyu de'i lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen yin te /
translated: The cause of the taste is the substantial cause of the form, and it is the cooperating condition of the form.

original: de ltar ro'i nye bar len pa'i rgyu ro skyed par byed do //
analyzed: de ltar ro'i nye bar len pa'i rgyu ro skyed par byed do //
translated: Thus, the substantial cause of the taste generates the taste.üîΩ‚ÄúSince‚Äù means ‚Äúbecause.‚Äù Since it is so, therefore, one infers that the cause of the form is the form‚Äôs prior moment, which has the capacity to generate form and is not obstructed.

original: ni zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir gyi don te gang gi phyir de lta yin pa de'i phyir 'dir gzugs skyed pa'i nus pa gegs byar med pa can gzugs kyi skad cig snga ma'i lhan cig byed par gyur pa gang yin pa de lta bu'i rgyu rjesüîΩsu dpog par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: ni zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir gyi don te gang gi phyir de lta yin pa de'i phyir 'dir gzugs skyed pa'i nus pa gegs byar med pa can gzugs kyi skad cig snga ma'i lhan cig byed par gyur pa gang yin pa de lta bu'i rgyu rjes su dpog par byed pa yin no //
translated: The substantial cause of the form is the form‚Äôs prior moment, which has the capacity to generate form and is not obstructed.

original: 'di nyid la dper na bud shing gi 'gyur ba'i sol ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi nye bar len pa de nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'di nyid la dper na bud shing gi 'gyur ba'i sol ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi nye bar len pa de nyid yin no //
translated: For example, in this case, the substantial cause of the charcoal, which is characterized by the transformation of the fuel, is just that.

original: de yang 'ba' zhig ni de'i rgyu ma yin gyi 'on kyang me lhan cig byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de yang 'ba' zhig ni de'i rgyu ma yin gyi 'on kyang me lhan cig byed pa yin no //
translated: Moreover, it alone is not the cause of that, but rather the fire is the cooperating condition.

original: me yang du bskyed par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: me yang du bskyed par byed pa yin te /
translated: The fire also generates the smoke.

original: de ltar na de lta bu'i bud shing gi lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen du gyur pa'i me las du ba skye ba yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na de lta bu'i bud shing gi lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen du gyur pa'i me las du ba skye ba yin no //
translated: Thus, smoke arises from fire, which is the cooperative condition of such fuel.

original: du ba las de lta bu'i me rjes su dpag pa na bud shing gi 'gyur ba yang rjes su dpag par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: du ba las de lta bu'i me rjes su dpag pa na bud shing gi 'gyur ba yang rjes su dpag par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: When smoke is inferred from such fire, the transformation of fuel is also inferred.

original: dper na ji skad brjod pa'i khyad par gyis khyad par du gyur pa'i me'i du ba skyed pa rjes su dpog pa de bzhin du rgyu de lta bu rjes su dpog pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dper na ji skad brjod pa'i khyad par gyis khyad par du gyur pa'i me'i du ba skyed pa rjes su dpog pa de bzhin du rgyu de lta bu rjes su dpog pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Just as the smoke that is produced by fire with the particularities as stated is inferred, so too is the cause that is such inferred. This is the meaning.

original: gal te de lta na gzugs kyi skyed par byed pa'i tshogs pa gzugs dang ro dag ro'i yin par brjod par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te de lta na gzugs kyi skyed par byed pa'i tshogs pa gzugs dang ro dag ro'i yin par brjod par mi 'gyur te /
translated: If that is so, then the collection that produces form, which is both form and taste, would not be said to be the cause of taste.

original: ro skyed pa na ro gzugs la ltos par ma brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ro skyed pa na ro gzugs la ltos par ma brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because when taste is produced, taste is not said to depend on form.

original: des na gzugs dang ro dag tshogs pa gcig la rag las par ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: des na gzugs dang ro dag tshogs pa gcig la rag las par ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: How then could form and taste be dependent on the same collection?

original: ro las ni rgyur gyur pa'i ro rjes su dpog par 'thad pa yin te /
analyzed: ro las ni rgyur gyur pa'i ro rjes su dpog par 'thad pa yin te /
translated: It is tenable to infer a taste that is the cause of taste from taste.

original: rgyu med par 'bras bu mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro //üîΩde rjes su dpag pa las gzugs kyi rgyur gyur pa'i @57a * //
analyzed: rgyu med par 'bras bu mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro // de rjes su dpag pa las gzugs kyi rgyur gyur pa'i @57a * //
translated: because an effect does not occur without a cause.

original: gzugs rjes su dpag pa na /
analyzed: gzugs rjes su dpag pa na /
translated: When one infers the form that is the cause of form,

original: gal te khyad par rtogs pa med par khyad par can mi rtogs pa'i phyir 'bras bur gyur pa'i gzugs la rtogs pa tsam 'dod na /
analyzed: gal te khyad par rtogs pa med par khyad par can mi rtogs pa'i phyir 'bras bur gyur pa'i gzugs la rtogs pa tsam 'dod na /
translated: if one asserts that the mere apprehension of the form that is the effect is the apprehension of the form that is the cause,

original: der ni 'gyur la rag ste de tsam gyi tshad ma'i yul nyid ni ma yin no //üîΩ'on te de ltar rtogs pa der yod par mi 'khrul pa'i phyir tshad ma'i yul nyid yin no //
analyzed: der ni 'gyur la rag ste de tsam gyi tshad ma'i yul nyid ni ma yin no // 'on te de ltar rtogs pa der yod par mi 'khrul pa'i phyir tshad ma'i yul nyid yin no //
translated: then that is so, but it is not the object of valid knowledge.üîΩIf one asserts that the object of valid knowledge is the apprehension of the form that is the cause because the apprehension of the form that is the cause is not mistaken with regard to the form that is the effect,

original: de ni mi nus te rgyu 'bras bu la nges pa med pa'i phyir dang yod kyang shes par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni mi nus te rgyu 'bras bu la nges pa med pa'i phyir dang yod kyang shes par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: that is not possible because the cause is not ascertained in the effect and because even if it exists, it cannot be known.

original: des na ji ltar rgyu'i chos rjes su dpag pas gzugs rjes su dpag go //üîΩdogs pa 'di bsu nas re zhig gzugs la 'khrul pa med pa bshad pa ni /
analyzed: des na ji ltar rgyu'i chos rjes su dpag pas gzugs rjes su dpag go // dogs pa 'di bsu nas re zhig gzugs la 'khrul pa med pa bshad pa ni /
translated: Therefore, how is the form that is the cause inferred by the inference of the form that is the effect?

original: 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Anticipating this qualm, the explanation that the form that is the cause is not mistaken with regard to the form that is the effect is ‚ÄúIt is like this.‚Äù

original: rang gi 'bras bu skyed pa'i mtshan nyid ni nus pa ni gags byar med pa nyid de nus pa 'jug pa de'o //
analyzed: rang gi 'bras bu skyed pa'i mtshan nyid ni nus pa ni gags byar med pa nyid de nus pa 'jug pa de'o //
translated: The definition of the cause that produces its own effect is the non-obstruction of its potentiality, which is the engagement of the potentiality.

original: 'grel pa ni rang gi rgyu'i zhes bya bas ni nus pa'i don bshad do //
analyzed: 'grel pa ni rang gi rgyu'i zhes bya bas ni nus pa'i don bshad do //
translated: The commentary explains the meaning of potentiality with the words ‚Äúof its own cause.‚Äù

original: 'bras bu skyed pa la mngon sum phyogs pa zhes bya bas ni 'jug pa'i rang bzhin gags byar med pa nyid yod par nges pa med par bshad do //
analyzed: 'bras bu skyed pa la mngon sum phyogs pa zhes bya bas ni 'jug pa'i rang bzhin gags byar med pa nyid yod par nges pa med par bshad do //
translated: With the words ‚Äúin the production of its effect, it is directed toward the effect,‚Äù it explains the non-obstruction of the nature of engagement, which is the certainty of existence.

original: nus pa 'jug pa de ci zhe na med par ni ro med ces brjod do //
analyzed: nus pa 'jug pa de ci zhe na med par ni ro med ces brjod do //
translated: What is the engagement of the potentiality? It is said that without it, there is no taste.

original: ji srid ro'i rgyu skyed pa la nus pa gags byar med pa ma yin pa de srid du ro mi 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: ji srid ro'i rgyu skyed pa la nus pa gags byar med pa ma yin pa de srid du ro mi 'byung ba'o //
translated: As long as the cause of the taste does not have the non-obstruction of the potentiality to produce the effect, the taste does not arise.

original: 'di skad brjod de gal te rgyu 'bras bu la nges pa ma yin na ro nyid yod par nges pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di skad brjod de gal te rgyu 'bras bu la nges pa ma yin na ro nyid yod par nges pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: This is what is said: If the cause is not certain with regard to the effect, the existence of the taste itself would not be certain.

original: 'on te 'bras bu skyed pa la mngon du phyogs pa'i rgyu las 'bras bu skye ba yin no zhes bya ba 'di yod na /
analyzed: 'on te 'bras bu skyed pa la mngon du phyogs pa'i rgyu las 'bras bu skye ba yin no zhes bya ba 'di yod na /
translated: But if the effect arises from a cause that is directed toward the production of the effect,

original: gzugs kyi rgyu yang gzugs skyed par nges pa kho na bas gzugs kyang gdon mi za bar yod pa nyid do //
analyzed: gzugs kyi rgyu yang gzugs skyed par nges pa kho na bas gzugs kyang gdon mi za bar yod pa nyid do //
translated: And since the cause of form is only the cause of the production of form, form also must exist without a doubt.

original: gal te ro'i nye bar len pa ni nye bar len pa can gyi ro'i skad cig dmigs pa las nges par grub kyi /
analyzed: gal te ro'i nye bar len pa ni nye bar len pa can gyi ro'i skad cig dmigs pa las nges par grub kyi /
translated: If the appropriation of taste is ascertained to be the cause of the moment of taste that appropriates it,

original: gzugs kyi ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gzugs kyi ni ma yin te /
translated: but not of form,

original: de'i nye bar len pa las byung ba ma grub pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: de'i nye bar len pa las byung ba ma grub pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: because its appropriation does not exist,

original: de nyid gzhan gyi rgyu zhes smos so //
analyzed: de nyid gzhan gyi rgyu zhes smos so //
translated: then the cause of form is the cause of another.

original: ro'i nye bar len pa'i rang gi nye bar len pa las byung ba'i skad cig bskyed par bya ba la nus pa 'jug pa gang yin pa de nyid gzhan gyis zhes bya ba gzugs kyi nye bar len pa'i rgyu'i nus pa 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: ro'i nye bar len pa'i rang gi nye bar len pa las byung ba'i skad cig bskyed par bya ba la nus pa 'jug pa gang yin pa de nyid gzhan gyis zhes bya ba gzugs kyi nye bar len pa'i rgyu'i nus pa 'jug pa yin no //
translated: The power of the moment of taste that arises from the appropriation of taste to produce what is to be produced is the power of the cause of the appropriation of form.

original: 'dir nus pa thogs pa med pa brjod par bya ba yin pa'i phyir gang gi nus pa 'jug pa'i phyir der rgyur nges par 'gyur ba rgyur gyur pa'i gzugs nyid @57b gzhan gyi sgra'i don yin gyi 'bras bu'i ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dir nus pa thogs pa med pa brjod par bya ba yin pa'i phyir gang gi nus pa 'jug pa'i phyir der rgyur nges par 'gyur ba rgyur gyur pa'i gzugs nyid @57b gzhan gyi sgra'i don yin gyi 'bras bu'i ni ma yin no //
translated: Since the unobstructed potential is to be described here, form alone is the cause of sound, because its potential engages in that sound, and it is ascertained as the cause of that sound. It is not the effect.üîΩIf that is so, then the engagement of the potential is not the cause of the essential nature of the form that is appropriated, because they are coemergent.

original: de lta na 'o na nus pa 'jug pa 'di gzugs kyi nye bar len pa'i rang gi ngo bo'i rgyu ma yin te lhan cig 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhe na bden te 'dir nus pa 'jug pa zhes bya ba 'brel pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta na 'o na nus pa 'jug pa 'di gzugs kyi nye bar len pa'i rang gi ngo bo'i rgyu ma yin te lhan cig 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhe na bden te 'dir nus pa 'jug pa zhes bya ba 'brel pa yin no //
translated: It is true that the engagement of the potential is related to the cause of the form that is appropriated.

original: des na ro'i nye bar len pa'i rgyu dang 'brel pa'i nus pa 'jug pa ni gzugs kyi nye bar len pa'i rgyu'i nus pa 'jug pa'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: des na ro'i nye bar len pa'i rgyu dang 'brel pa'i nus pa 'jug pa ni gzugs kyi nye bar len pa'i rgyu'i nus pa 'jug pa'i rgyu yin no //
translated: Therefore the engagement of the potential related to the cause of the form that is appropriated is the cause of the engagement of the potential of the form that is appropriated.

original: lhan cig 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir de las 'di 'byung ba yang ma yin no //
analyzed: lhan cig 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir de las 'di 'byung ba yang ma yin no //
translated: But it is not the case that this arises from that, because they are coemergent.

original: des na shugs kyis lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu ma yin no zhes brjod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na shugs kyis lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu ma yin no zhes brjod par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore it is said that it is not a coemergent cause.

original: des na don 'di yin te /
analyzed: des na don 'di yin te /
translated: Therefore, this is the meaning:

original: ro'i rgyu rang gi 'bras bu ro skyed pa na gzugs gzugs skyed par yang lhan cig byed pa nyid du rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: ro'i rgyu rang gi 'bras bu ro skyed pa na gzugs gzugs skyed par yang lhan cig byed pa nyid du rtogs pa yin no //
translated: When the cause of taste generates its own effect, taste, it is understood to be a co-operating cause in the generation of form.

original: des na ro'i rang gi 'bras bu skyed pa la mngon du phyogs pa gang yin pa de nyid gzugs gzugs skyed pa'i yang 'jug pa'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: des na ro'i rang gi 'bras bu skyed pa la mngon du phyogs pa gang yin pa de nyid gzugs gzugs skyed pa'i yang 'jug pa'i rgyu yin no //
translated: Therefore, that which is directed toward the generation of the own effect of taste is also the cause of the engagement in the generation of form.

original: des na ji ltar mngon du phyogs pa las ro skye ba de bzhin du gzugs kyang yin te /
analyzed: des na ji ltar mngon du phyogs pa las ro skye ba de bzhin du gzugs kyang yin te /
translated: Thus, just as taste arises from what is directed toward it, so too does form.

original: des na ro rtogs pa nyid las de'i tsho ro'i nye bar len pa'i rang gi 'bras bu la mngon du phyogs pa rtogs na gzugs kyi rang gi 'bras bu skyed pa la bar chad byar med pa yang rtogs par byed pa'i phyir dus mtshungs par yod pa'i gzugs
analyzed: des na ro rtogs pa nyid las de'i tsho ro'i nye bar len pa'i rang gi 'bras bu la mngon du phyogs pa rtogs na gzugs kyi rang gi 'bras bu skyed pa la bar chad byar med pa yang rtogs par byed pa'i phyir dus mtshungs par yod pa'i gzugs
translated: Therefore, when one understands the mere existence of form through the understanding of taste, one also understands the non-obstruction to the generation of the own effect of form, which is directed toward the own effect of taste that is being appropriated. Thus, form that exists at the same time as taste

original: yod par rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yod par rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: is understood to exist.

original: rang gi 'bras bu skyed par byed pa de rang gi 'bras bu'i skyed par byed pa yin pa bzhin du /
analyzed: rang gi 'bras bu skyed par byed pa de rang gi 'bras bu'i skyed par byed pa yin pa bzhin du /
translated: Just as the cause that generates its own effect is the generator of its own effect,

original: gzugs kyi lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen du gyur pa yin pa'i phyir ji ltar rang gi 'bras bu las ro nyid du rtogs pa de bzhin du de lta bur gyur pa'i gzugs kyi lhan cig byed bar yang yin no //
analyzed: gzugs kyi lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen du gyur pa yin pa'i phyir ji ltar rang gi 'bras bu las ro nyid du rtogs pa de bzhin du de lta bur gyur pa'i gzugs kyi lhan cig byed bar yang yin no //
translated: so too, it is the coemergent cause of form because it is the coemergent condition of form.

original: des na de'i 'bras bu dus mtshungs par yod pa'i gzugs med na de'i 'bras bu nyid med par ro //
analyzed: des na de'i 'bras bu dus mtshungs par yod pa'i gzugs med na de'i 'bras bu nyid med par ro //
translated: Therefore, if the form that is its effect does not exist at the same time as it, it would not be its effect.

original: de de'i lhan cig byed pa yin pa yin na ni de'i yang rgyur 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: de de'i lhan cig byed pa yin pa yin na ni de'i yang rgyur 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: If it were its coemergent cause, it would also be its cause.

original: lhan cig byed pa'i rang gi ngo bo ni lhan cig tu byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lhan cig byed pa'i rang gi ngo bo ni lhan cig tu byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The nature of a coemergent cause is to be coemergent.

original: des na rgyu gcig nyid 'bras bu gnyis skyed nus pa khyad par med pas na de'i 'bras bu gcig yod pa bzhin du 'bras bu gzhan yang yod pa kho na'o //
analyzed: des na rgyu gcig nyid 'bras bu gnyis skyed nus pa khyad par med pas na de'i 'bras bu gcig yod pa bzhin du 'bras bu gzhan yang yod pa kho na'o //
translated: Therefore, since a single cause is not differentiated in its ability to generate two effects, the other effect would exist just like the one that exists.

original: nus pa gcig 'bras bu gnyis kyi don du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di ga las she na /üîΩma du lung ga la sogs pa la gzugs dang ro dag phan tshun gyi rang bzhin @58a * //
analyzed: nus pa gcig 'bras bu gnyis kyi don du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di ga las she na / ma du lung ga la sogs pa la gzugs dang ro dag phan tshun gyi rang bzhin @58a * //
translated: How do you know that a single potency can be the meaning of two results?

original: rjes su byed par mthong ba'i phyir dang smin pa la sogs pa'i gnas skabs su ro'i khyad par bzhin gzugs kyang mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rjes su byed par mthong ba'i phyir dang smin pa la sogs pa'i gnas skabs su ro'i khyad par bzhin gzugs kyang mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because in the case of curd and so on, form and taste are seen to mutually conform to each other‚Äôs nature, and because form is seen to have a special taste in the state of ripeness and so on.

original: gang gis 'di'i rang gi bdag nyid kyi khyad par gang yin pa de ro la yang yod par 'gyur ba gzugs nyid ni ro ma yin no//
analyzed: gang gis 'di'i rang gi bdag nyid kyi khyad par gang yin pa de ro la yang yod par 'gyur ba gzugs nyid ni ro ma yin no//
translated: But form is not taste, for by that, whatever is its special nature, that would also exist in taste.

original: des na de'i nye bar len pa dag phan tshun nye bar len pa las byung ba'i skad cig la brten pa'i khyad par gyi rgyu ma yin par gzugs dang ro dag gi khyad par phan tshun rjes su byed par nges pa 'di mi 'grub pa'o //
analyzed: des na de'i nye bar len pa dag phan tshun nye bar len pa las byung ba'i skad cig la brten pa'i khyad par gyi rgyu ma yin par gzugs dang ro dag gi khyad par phan tshun rjes su byed par nges pa 'di mi 'grub pa'o //
translated: Therefore, it is not established that form and taste are ascertained to mutually conform to each other‚Äôs special nature arising from the mutual appropriation of their respective moments of arising, because they are not causes of the special nature of each other‚Äôs appropriation.

original: nye bar len pa dag gi lhan cig byed pa yang de nyid yin la /
analyzed: nye bar len pa dag gi lhan cig byed pa yang de nyid yin la /
translated: That is also the cooperating cause of their respective appropriations.

original: de yang tshogs pa gcig la rag las pa nyid do //
analyzed: de yang tshogs pa gcig la rag las pa nyid do //
translated: and this is dependent on a single collection.

original: mdo 'di nyid rnam par 'grel pa ni rang gi rgyu'i zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: mdo 'di nyid rnam par 'grel pa ni rang gi rgyu'i zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: The present verse explains this S≈´tra passage.

original: 'dir ji ltar gzugs kyi nye bar len pa rnams gzhan gyi sgra'i don yin pa dang / ji ltar 'jug pa'i rgyu nyid yin par rtogs pa de ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: 'dir ji ltar gzugs kyi nye bar len pa rnams gzhan gyi sgra'i don yin pa dang / ji ltar 'jug pa'i rgyu nyid yin par rtogs pa de ni bshad zin to //
translated: Here, it has been explained how the appropriator of form is the meaning of the term other, and how it is understood to be the cause of engagement.

original: tshogs pa gcig la rag las pa nyid grub par bya ba'i don du /
analyzed: tshogs pa gcig la rag las pa nyid grub par bya ba'i don du /
translated: In order to establish that it is dependent on a single collection,

original: gzugs kyang ro'i lhan cig byed pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir brjod pa ni gzugs kyi nye bar len pa'i rgyu rang gi 'bras bu skyed pa la mngon du phyogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'jug pa'i lhan cig byed pa gang la yod pa de ni de skad ces
analyzed: gzugs kyang ro'i lhan cig byed pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir brjod pa ni gzugs kyi nye bar len pa'i rgyu rang gi 'bras bu skyed pa la mngon du phyogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'jug pa'i lhan cig byed pa gang la yod pa de ni de skad ces
translated: in order to demonstrate that form is the co-operating cause of taste, it is said: That which has the cause of form as a co-operating cause in the generation of its own effect, which is characterized by engagement, is said to be the co-operating cause of form.

original: bya'o // de yang gang zhe na bshad pa sngar brjod pa'i gzugs kyis nye bar len pa'i lhan cig byed pa ro'i nye bar len pa'i rgyu 'jug pa gang yin pa de yang ngo //
analyzed: bya'o // de yang gang zhe na bshad pa sngar brjod pa'i gzugs kyis nye bar len pa'i lhan cig byed pa ro'i nye bar len pa'i rgyu 'jug pa gang yin pa de yang ngo //
translated: What is that? It is the cause of the appropriation of form, which is the cause of the appropriation of taste, which is the cause of the generation of form.

original: des na de ltar 'di gnyis phan tshun lhan cig byed pa nyid du bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: des na de ltar 'di gnyis phan tshun lhan cig byed pa nyid du bshad pa yin no //
translated: Thus, these two are explained as being mutually simultaneous causes.

original: de ltar mi 'khrul pa bsgrubs nas ji ltar mi 'khrul pa de kho na ltar rjes su dpog pa yin no zhes bshad pa ni de'i phyir zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de ltar mi 'khrul pa bsgrubs nas ji ltar mi 'khrul pa de kho na ltar rjes su dpog pa yin no zhes bshad pa ni de'i phyir zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: Having thus established the non-erroneous, he explains how it is inferred just as it is: ‚ÄúTherefore, . . .‚Äù

original: gzugs skyed par byed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rgyu ji lta bu las ro 'byung ba'i rgyu de lta bu'i ros rjes su dpog par byed pa na gzugs rjes su dpog par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: gzugs skyed par byed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rgyu ji lta bu las ro 'byung ba'i rgyu de lta bu'i ros rjes su dpog par byed pa na gzugs rjes su dpog par byed pa yin no //
translated: From a cause of the same type as the cause of the generation of form, taste arises. When taste is inferred as the cause of the generation of form, form is inferred.

original: de nyid kyi phyir ro las gzugs bar chad med par rtogs par mi nus te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir ro las gzugs bar chad med par rtogs par mi nus te /
translated: Therefore, form cannot be understood without taste.

original: ro dmigs pa las gzugs kyi rgyu nus pa 'jug pa yod pa ma rtogs par gzugs yod pa mi rtogs pa'i phyir dang / ro'i rnam pa de lta bu las gzugs kyi rgyu nus pa zhugs pa yod par rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ro dmigs pa las gzugs kyi rgyu nus pa 'jug pa yod pa ma rtogs par gzugs yod pa mi rtogs pa'i phyir dang / ro'i rnam pa de lta bu las gzugs kyi rgyu nus pa zhugs pa yod par rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because form is not perceived when the potency of the cause of form is not perceived in the object, and because the existence of the potency of the cause of form is perceived in that kind of object.

original: de na gzugs rtogs pa ni gzugs kyi rgyur gyur @58b pa'i ro'i rgyu yod par rtogs par bya ba gzugs skyed pa la gegs byar med pa'i nus pa dang ldan pa rtogs pa'i nang du 'dus pa kho na'o //üîΩde nyid kyi phyir rgyu yod par rjes su dpag pa na rgyu las 'bras bu rjes su dpog pa yin no zhes nus pa ma yin te rgyu nyid rjes su dpag pa na 'bras bu yod par rtogs pa grub pa'i phyir yang rjes su dpog pa don med
analyzed: de na gzugs rtogs pa ni gzugs kyi rgyur gyur @58b pa'i ro'i rgyu yod par rtogs par bya ba gzugs skyed pa la gegs byar med pa'i nus pa dang ldan pa rtogs pa'i nang du 'dus pa kho na'o // de nyid kyi phyir rgyu yod par rjes su dpag pa na rgyu las 'bras bu rjes su dpog pa yin no zhes nus pa ma yin te rgyu nyid rjes su dpag pa na 'bras bu yod par rtogs pa grub pa'i phyir yang rjes su dpog pa don med
translated: The perception of form in that case is included in the perception of the existence of the cause of form, which is the cause of the potency to generate form, which is endowed with the capacity to prevent the obstruction of the generation of form.

original: pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: pa'i phyir ro //
translated: For this very reason, when the existence of the cause is inferred, the effect is inferred from the cause. It is not possible, because when the cause itself is inferred, the existence of the effect is established, and it is pointless to infer it again.

original: 'jig rten de ltar ro las gzugs rtogs pa med do zhe na /
analyzed: 'jig rten de ltar ro las gzugs rtogs pa med do zhe na /
translated: The world does not perceive form from the object in that way.

original: 'jig rten de ltar mi rtogs na ni mi 'khrul pa de ltar rtogs pa med pa nyid du brjod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten de ltar mi rtogs na ni mi 'khrul pa de ltar rtogs pa med pa nyid du brjod par 'gyur ro //
translated: If the world did not understand it in that way, then it would be said that it is not understood as non-erroneous.

original: de lta bu ni de rtogs pa yin yang tshad ma ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta bu ni de rtogs pa yin yang tshad ma ma yin no //
translated: Even though it is understood in that way, it is not a valid cognition.

original: mi 'khrul ba rtogs na yang ji skad bshad pa'i tshul las mi 'da' bar 'grub bo //
analyzed: mi 'khrul ba rtogs na yang ji skad bshad pa'i tshul las mi 'da' bar 'grub bo //
translated: Even if it is understood as non-erroneous, it is established that it does not go beyond the method explained above.

original: gal te gang las khyad par nyid kyi rtogs pa skyes pa de rjes su dpag par bya ba yin na tshogs pa las 'bras bu 'grub par rung ba rjes su dpog pa na yang 'bras bu rjes su dpag par bya bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te gang las khyad par nyid kyi rtogs pa skyes pa de rjes su dpag par bya ba yin na tshogs pa las 'bras bu 'grub par rung ba rjes su dpog pa na yang 'bras bu rjes su dpag par bya bar 'gyur te /
translated: If that from which the understanding of the specific effect arises is to be inferred, then when inferring the production of an effect from a collection of causes, the effect would also be what is to be inferred,üîΩbecause that is understood in that way.

original: de yang der rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhe na ma yin no zhes bshad pa ni /
analyzed: de yang der rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhe na ma yin no zhes bshad pa ni /
translated: To explain that this is not so, he says:

original: ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no //
translated: Just as... and so on.

original: ji skad bshad pa'i rnam pa des na 'das pa rnams rtogs pa yin te /
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa'i rnam pa des na 'das pa rnams rtogs pa yin te /
translated: In the manner explained above, the past is understood.

original: dper na ro'i gzugs kyi lhan cig byed par rjes su dpog pa na gzugs dang ro dag bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na ro'i gzugs kyi lhan cig byed par rjes su dpog pa na gzugs dang ro dag bzhin no //
translated: For example, when inferring the co-operation of the form of a taste, it is like the form and taste.

original: gegs byar med pa'i nus pa rtogs pas 'phangs pa ni lhan cig 'byung bar rtogs so //
analyzed: gegs byar med pa'i nus pa rtogs pas 'phangs pa ni lhan cig 'byung bar rtogs so //
translated: The power of the cause to generate the effect is realized through the realization of the absence of obstruction to the effect.

original: de phan chad ni gzugs kyi rgyu gzugs skyed pa la nus pa chod pa med par 'gyur ba'i tshad ma med do //
analyzed: de phan chad ni gzugs kyi rgyu gzugs skyed pa la nus pa chod pa med par 'gyur ba'i tshad ma med do //
translated: Beyond that, there is no valid cognition to determine that the cause of form has the power to generate form without obstruction.

original: des na ma 'ongs pa rnams ni rtogs pa ma yin te ;
analyzed: des na ma 'ongs pa rnams ni rtogs pa ma yin te ;
translated: Therefore, future forms are not realized.

original: ji ltar ro 'bras bu dmigs pa las 'og rol du yang gzugs yod pa bzhin no //
analyzed: ji ltar ro 'bras bu dmigs pa las 'og rol du yang gzugs yod pa bzhin no //
translated: Just as form is perceived below the fruit of the mango tree, so it is above the tree.

original: 'khrul pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs so //
analyzed: 'khrul pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs so //
translated: Because of delusion, this is the reason.

original: de lta bas ni zhes bya ba ni mjug bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: de lta bas ni zhes bya ba ni mjug bsdu ba'o //
translated: Therefore is the conclusion.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya bas ni rnam gsum nyid ces bya ba'i don 'di grub par bstan pa yin no ;
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya bas ni rnam gsum nyid ces bya ba'i don 'di grub par bstan pa yin no ;
translated: By therefore, he shows that the meaning of triad is established.

original: / rang bzhin ma 'brel ba ni zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs so //
analyzed: / rang bzhin ma 'brel ba ni zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs so //
translated: Unrelated by nature is the reason.

original: rgyu'i chos rjes su dpog pa 'di ni grog ma 'pho ba la sogs pa las char pa bab pa la sogs pa rjes su dpog pa yang rgyu'i chos rjes su dpag pa'i rang bzhin du bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: rgyu'i chos rjes su dpog pa 'di ni grog ma 'pho ba la sogs pa las char pa bab pa la sogs pa rjes su dpog pa yang rgyu'i chos rjes su dpag pa'i rang bzhin du bshad pa yin no //
translated: This inference of the effect from the cause is also the nature of the inference of the cause from the effect, as in the case of the inference of rain from the movement of ants, etc.

original: de la yang 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i char pa'i rgyu kho na @59a * //
analyzed: de la yang 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i char pa'i rgyu kho na @59a * //
translated: In this case, the cause of the future rain is the cause of the movement of the ants, etc.

original: grog ma la sogs pa 'khrul pa'i rgyu yin no //üîΩ'byung bar 'gyur ba gang las char pa skyed pa de nyid las grog ma la sogs pa 'khrul pa yin te /
analyzed: grog ma la sogs pa 'khrul pa'i rgyu yin no // 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang las char pa skyed pa de nyid las grog ma la sogs pa 'khrul pa yin te /
translated: The cause of the error of the ants, etc. is the cause of the future rain.

original: char gyi rgyu'i 'byung ba rnams nyid 'gyur ba na grog ma la sogs pa cung zad 'khrul par byed pa de 'phel bar 'gyur ba na ji srid char 'bab pa de srid du de yang 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: char gyi rgyu'i 'byung ba rnams nyid 'gyur ba na grog ma la sogs pa cung zad 'khrul par byed pa de 'phel bar 'gyur ba na ji srid char 'bab pa de srid du de yang 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The very elements that produce the future rain are the elements that, when they change, cause the slight error of the ants, etc. When they increase, they cause the increase of the error of the ants, etc. until the rain falls.

original: de yang char mi mthong ba la ni de'i rgyu rung ba nyid rjes su dpag par bya ba yin la /
analyzed: de yang char mi mthong ba la ni de'i rgyu rung ba nyid rjes su dpag par bya ba yin la /
translated: And when the rain is not seen, the suitability of its cause is to be inferred.

original: phyis ni char pa mngon du 'gyur la 'khrul pa la sogs pa yang khyad par du gyur na ni da ltar ba'i char rjes su dpog go //
analyzed: phyis ni char pa mngon du 'gyur la 'khrul pa la sogs pa yang khyad par du gyur na ni da ltar ba'i char rjes su dpog go //
translated: Later, when the rain becomes manifest and the error, etc., becomes distinctive, then the present rain is inferred.

original: 'di la 'di ni mngon par zhen pa'i yul ma gyi /
analyzed: 'di la 'di ni mngon par zhen pa'i yul ma gyi /
translated: Here, one should not be attached to this as an object of manifest clinging.

original: 'on kyang rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po ma yin pa tshogs pa gcig la rag las pa med par de ltar mi 'thad do zhes bya ba 'di tsam zhig brjod do //
analyzed: 'on kyang rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po ma yin pa tshogs pa gcig la rag las pa med par de ltar mi 'thad do zhes bya ba 'di tsam zhig brjod do //
translated: However, one should simply say that it is not tenable for something that is not a causal entity to be dependent on a single collection.

original: rnam pa 'di lta bu la sogs pa dag tu ni rigs pa tsam zhig bstan par bya ba yin te rnam pa la mngon par zhen pas ci bya /
analyzed: rnam pa 'di lta bu la sogs pa dag tu ni rigs pa tsam zhig bstan par bya ba yin te rnam pa la mngon par zhen pas ci bya /
translated: In such cases, one should simply teach mere reasoning. What is the use of being attached to the mode?

original: des na de ltar tshul gsum dang ldan pa'i gtan tshigs rnam pa gsum yin pa'i phyir de ni rnam gsum nyid ces bya ba'i mthar thug pa bshad nas gtan tshigs ltar snang de las gzhan zhes bya ba bshad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: des na de ltar tshul gsum dang ldan pa'i gtan tshigs rnam pa gsum yin pa'i phyir de ni rnam gsum nyid ces bya ba'i mthar thug pa bshad nas gtan tshigs ltar snang de las gzhan zhes bya ba bshad pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, having explained the conclusion that the reason has three modes in that way, in order to explain ‚Äúthe fallacious reason is different from that,‚Äù

original: rgyu ma tshogs pas zhes smos so //
analyzed: rgyu ma tshogs pas zhes smos so //
translated: he says, ‚Äúby the non-collection of the cause.‚Äù

original: ma tshogs pa ni ma tshang ba'o //
analyzed: ma tshogs pa ni ma tshang ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúNon-collection‚Äù means ‚Äúincomplete.‚Äù

original: lhan cig byed pa ji snyed pas 'bras bu bsgrub par bya ba de snyed pa de ni rgyu tshogs pa yin no //
analyzed: lhan cig byed pa ji snyed pas 'bras bu bsgrub par bya ba de snyed pa de ni rgyu tshogs pa yin no //
translated: The collection of causes is the totality of the cooperating causes that bring about the effect.

original: de la gang gi tshe lhan cig byed pa mtshang ba de'i rgyu ma tshogs pa yin no //üîΩde lta bur gyur pas rjes su dpog pa'i rjes su dpog pa gang yin pa de ni lhag ma dang ldan pa yin te /
analyzed: de la gang gi tshe lhan cig byed pa mtshang ba de'i rgyu ma tshogs pa yin no // de lta bur gyur pas rjes su dpog pa'i rjes su dpog pa gang yin pa de ni lhag ma dang ldan pa yin te /
translated: When the cooperating causes are incomplete, the cause is not complete.üîΩThe inference that is based on such a cause is said to be ‚Äúincomplete.‚Äù

original: ma mthong btsam gyis ldog par grub pa gtan tshigs su sbyar ba yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: ma mthong btsam gyis ldog par grub pa gtan tshigs su sbyar ba yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning is that the mere non-perception of the reason is not sufficient to establish the negation.

original: de ltar yang /üîΩgang zhig ma mthong ba tsam gyis //
analyzed: de ltar yang / gang zhig ma mthong ba tsam gyis //
translated: As it is said:üîΩ‚ÄúThe one who teaches the negation

original: ldog pa rab tu ston byed pa //
analyzed: ldog pa rab tu ston byed pa //
translated: By the mere non-perception of something,

original: zhes lhag ma dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes lhag ma dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: This is the definition of the incomplete that will be explained.

original: des na rjes su dpag pa 'di lhag ma dang ldan par brjod pas ldog pa ma mthong ba tsam gyis grub pa nyid du brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: des na rjes su dpag pa 'di lhag ma dang ldan par brjod pas ldog pa ma mthong ba tsam gyis grub pa nyid du brjod pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, since this inference is said to be incomplete, the mere non-perception of the reason is not sufficient to establish the negation.

original: de'i don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de'i don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of this is as follows:

original: 'brel pas bsgrub par bya ba'i med na mi 'byung ba 'grub par bya ba'i phyir tshul gsum las bsdu ba byas pa des na de las gzhan gtan tshigs su brjod pa ni ma mthong bas 'grub pa'i ldog @59b pa la brten nas yin pas der ni med na
analyzed: 'brel pas bsgrub par bya ba'i med na mi 'byung ba 'grub par bya ba'i phyir tshul gsum las bsdu ba byas pa des na de las gzhan gtan tshigs su brjod pa ni ma mthong bas 'grub pa'i ldog @59b pa la brten nas yin pas der ni med na
translated: In order to establish the invariable concomitance that is to be proven by the relation, the inclusion is made from the three modes. Since that is seen to be the case, the statement of the reason is not seen to be otherwise. Therefore, it is based on the negation of establishment.

original: mi 'byung ba de'i tshad ma can du brjod par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: mi 'byung ba de'i tshad ma can du brjod par bya ba yin no //
